Draco asked a bit too aggressively for the occasion.Blaise rolled his eyes and put his elbows on the table, clasping his hands under his chin.You know very well what Blaise said, not at all affected by Draco's grouchiness. summaries: The Starks are an ancient family known for their druids in Ireland. The Starks have proven to be extremely promising, even though druids are not inherited and only the strongest may become one. In addition to being poets, explorers, teachers, judges, and history recorders, druids are also recognized healers and seers. They receive arduous, rigorous, and protracted training.The Starks maintain their practice of blood sacrifices and their knowledge of weirwood trees while other Druids perish and their methods of seeing the truth through oak trees are forgotten.The ability of druids to communicate with animals and spirits has long been recognized; however, the Starks stand out due to their capacity for skin-shifting.Ollivander picked up the common druid style of a grapevine wand, whereas the Starks have always made their wands from weirwood trees.They typically never traveled east to England and are proud of their old ways.That is, until, one day, out of the blue, the eldest Stark daughter received a Hogwarts letter.

I didn't expect any of it. There was no plan. I thought I'd make Muggle Studies bearable by not correcting your assumption about my blood status, and that would be the end of it. summaries: Esquire Hermione Granger is in desperate need of some self-care. Unfortunately and unexpectedly, it comes at the hands of a masseuse by the name of Draco Malfoy. After an explosive fight and an apology via literature, Draco and Hermione come to an agreement: free experimental massages in exchange for Hermione acting as Draco's guinea pig. As they spend time together, they begin to drop their walls and realise that perhaps their relationship need not be solely transactional. Enter meddling friends, a mother's misguided attempt to help, and a once-bitter rivalry turned into something soft and tender.

summaries: Hanna Black returns to London ten years after her mother's death. Hogwarts will be her new home, but, what if in the mist of new friendships, adventure and love, she finds old demons and nightmares that will return to hunt her.Enemies lurk around every corner, friends among strangers and maybe... new lovers?Uncertainties will always be by her side, will she know how to choose what is best for her?Is it really true that Slytherins can't love and be loved? Does all Gryffindors are pure and brave as they say? What if all she knows is a lie? What if everything they thought they knew was only a part of something bigger than all of them?What will Hanna chose? Jungkook or Yoongi? Griffindor or Slytherin? What's right? What's wrong? Who and where is the enemy? The war outside between the Nyx Organization and the Muggle and Wizard world seems to come to Hogwarts. Who's gonna fight?But a much bigger war is going on inside the castle, in her heart!Read to find out...PS: this is a Jungkook fanfiction as much as it is a Yoongi fanfiction. This story is about Hanna (reader) and the love triangle between her and them. (There's no love story between Yoongi and Jungkook)©THEODORA©

summaries: Nel 2003 Lord Voldemort vince la guerra contro l'Ordine della Fenice, distruggendone quello che ne restava. Diciassette anni dopo, Draco Malfoy è un alcolizzato che vive da solo in un fatiscente Malfoy Manor con nient'altro a tenergli compagnia se non la sua solitudine. Tutto cambia quando una strega a lungo ritenuta morta viene trascinata ad Azkaban e per salvarla da un futuro peggiore della morte, Draco deve portarla con sé.Estratto dal capitolo 1:Quando i suoi occhi grigi la trovarono, sentì lo stomaco contorcersi nel suo corpo. La sua piccola figura era seduta nell'angolo più remoto della cella, con le braccia avvolte attorno alle gambe che aveva piegato per coprire la sua nudità. Una cascata di riccioli scuri e aggrovigliati circondava il suo viso ovale. Il suo mento era appoggiato sullo spazio limitato tra le ginocchia. La sua mascella era serrata. I suoi polsi e le sue caviglie erano coperti da manette da cui partivano le catene che terminavano sui muri. Era così immobile che avrebbe potuto anche essere sotto un incantesimo pietrificante ma, qualunque cosa le avessero fatto, non erano riusciti a spegnere il fuoco nei suoi occhi.

summaries: On October 31, 1981, Lily Potter is found dead next to her son's crib and James Potter has never managed to shake the guilt of leaving her alone that night. Lost in grieving, he packs up his son and best friend and tries to start a new life on the other side of the world, far away from the wartorn wizarding world of his youth.But the past refuses to be left behind. With the shadow of their departure mired in scandal back home that brands them with the scornful suspicion of a wizarding population whose minds turn easily, James and Sirius have spent the last ten years giving Harry the best childhood they can. Yet when Harry's letter inevitably comes, James struggles to come to terms with letting go, especially with the knowledge of the threat still out there amidst the manipulations of the most powerful wizard in magical Britain who wants nothing more than for his son to be canon fodder in the upcoming war, as well as a lingering bitterness between his remaining friends, and the whispers of the malignant presence of a man who should have remained dead.

summaries: Magic and Mayhem a fascinating tale of friendship and love. A girl named Stephanie Emerson living happily with her parents Samantha and Joseph Emerson. Gets a chance to go to the finest school 'Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry' and there she meets the famous boy with the lightning scar named Harry Potter who does not know that he is famous. She becomes there friends and along with Ron, Hermione, Harry and Stephanie they dive into the adventures that take place every year. With some troubles and fun.What will happen when she and Harry loves each other more than friends will they able to overcome their feelings or fate will make them together. So let's dive in to this magical story of friendship and love.

summaries: During the battle of Hogwarts, the night of a full moon, Draco Malfoy is bitten by a werewolf.With no way to escape the curse, all he can do is hide it.Hermione Granger is the only one- aside from his attacker- who knows the truth. And it’s only because she was with him when it happened.When they return to Hogwarts for their 8th year, however, that is not the only secret they are forced to share. Because ever since he was bitten, Draco has grappled with an intense and disconcerting need to be around the Gryffindor Witch.Neither of them like that, which leaves Draco constantly struggling to rein in all of the possessive and protective instincts that assault him when it comes to Hermione.Will she aid him in hiding the curse? Will they uncover the truth about Draco’s obsession? In the meantime, will they fall deeply and irreversibly in love? This will be a long fic.I will post a chapter every week, at least. Do not worry, this story will be completed. I would NEVER leave it as a WIP.

summaries: Affinity. One tiny, almost unheard of word that surfaces in the back of his mind from a book read so long ago that he can no longer recall the title, only the yellowed fabric cover. Something so unheard of he is surprised he remembers it at all, a bedtime story, a fairytale for the Wizarding world. Something so impossible that it cannot possibly be real, and yet the certainty of it has settled deeply in his bones.He wonders if she knows. Wonders if she understands the magnitude of what has passed between them (what will pass between them, the voice in the back of his mind hisses). She has grown up in the Muggle world, she likely does not know or understand the intimacy of something that is barely more than a myth, even to most witches and wizards. He throws the fire whiskey back, and pours another drink, fully intending to drink beyond memory. To erase that look in Granger's eyes from his mind.

And where one had a happy upbringing with two loving fathers, one has to hide a life-threatening secret.Draco Malfoys childhood has not always been easy, but after giving away his own father to the police and finding the love of his life, he dares believing that he’ll be okay. summaries: This is not a beginning, this is the target.It’s like when you’re born, you’re a bullet being shot – powder and sparks. The trajectory is set and you’re flying violently through life, coursing through people and time, leaving your mark. Some people you take longer to go through, some people you crash into and they deviate your path for a while, some people fly with you along the way. You’re full of scars as other bullets go through you and you can’t help but to be a scar on them.In the end, you always end up where you were supposed to. You were shot within a target in mind, and while you may go through some smaller targets like they’re your checkpoints, you still get to your goal. It doesn’t matter if you stray, if you change – you were always meant to.Ever since you were a potential harm in the chamber, you’re someone’s last resort and someone’s last chance. Someone’s pain and someone’s saving grace. You’re someone’s target.The world is a shooting range, try and get the least possible wounds. Do not lose focus. Everything has led you to this.***Or University AU where most of them don't know each other yet and have lots of background to unpack.

summaries: It's the mid 1970's and Severus Snape has just been signed up against his will for an international Wizarding pen-pal service. Initially uninterested in the whole thing, he begins to turn to the American girl writing to him more and more as he faces increasingly terrifying abuse at school and home as well as ostracization from his peers. As a friendship begrudgingly begins it brings with it a hope for the future, comfort, and more than its fair share of problems. In this fic we'll examine how Severus Snape managed to live an almost normal life, completely in secret, even when everyone around him in the Wizarding World sought only to use he and his life towards their own ends.Death or Glory will follow Severus Snape's entire life through canon and the lives of other characters beyond it. Consequently this fic is going to be LONG. I mean concerningly long. It updates consistently on Tuesday mornings, Central Standard Time, and will continue to until we're done here.

summaries: -Book is written into third person perspective -It seems the myth of Pandora's Box was true. Once you open it, it brings disasters. She thought what was between him and me was different.Ever since they were kids, he tormented her. Those jade-green eyes were the source of her nightmares. He never let her escape.It was all a game Hermione had no chance of winning.Because Draco Malfoy was always one step ahead. He despised her since forever. In a dark corner of his mind, the reason was that he couldn't have her. The forbidden fruit.His best friend's little sister. A spoiled brat. summaries: Harry Potter. That was the name. His hair was messy, his sleeves stained with mud, his knees scraped and never healing. And, above him, the air of having crawled out of some narrow and uncomfortable rabbit hole, of being one bad comment away from jumping out of a window and never being seen again. Like someone who was born sick and weak, and grew up fighting, fighting like a mouse in a world too big, too cruel. If his smile wasn't so cunning and a fierce flash of blue didn't still linger in his eyes, she wouldn't have believed it. Hypocrite, tyrant, bastard. How could he, after all, still be alive?  Eisoptrophobia: noun. Irrational, overwhelming fear of seeing one’s reflection in a mirror.

Her ideals and morals are at odds with what she wants. Hermione is blindsided by the enigma of Theodore Nott, a handsome Slytherin who shares no love for the extremist views he has grown up with, and who challenges all she thought she knew about Purebloods. Meanwhile, Theo, a boy who is scarred both emotionally and physically, craves hope and light, but will fighting for that put his life on the line? Is he willing to?

summaries: A boy is running for his life. Sweat clings to his neck, the air is still filled with heat from the day. There is no mob chasing him, no angry rider with a sword, or even a servant on his heels. There is just a soft glow in the distance, wedding bells, and a party. The sun spills streaks of gold over the mossy ground and dips the whole forest entrance in a soft near holy glow, and the boy runs, his heart pounding in his chest, forcing himself to beat the dying light.OR:Two brothers grow up in the county side of France. One of them is left behind, forced to make a deal, to escape a loveless marriage and live with the body that always should have been his. Then somehow he ends up in Berlin of all cities.(Fuck JKR, Love to V.E Schwab)Based on the invisible life of Addie LaRue. <3

summaries: Remus J Lupin had barely been able to hold back his fury, for months he watched his best friends' tiny boy be covered head to foot in bruises, dressed in clothes that were three times too big, his body so malnourished that when Remus had picked him up, he felt every single rib.For months he had watched in silence, biting back his temper, until it all became too much, and he had to act.Now he has his best friends' son in his care and full moon is three days away. There is only person in the entire world that he trusts to look after Harry AND not immediately run and report what he has done to Dumbledore.The problem is Remus hasn't spoken to Severus Snape in four years. He left him, abandoned him when Severus needed him most, and now he was just going to drop back into his life, with Lily Potter's son at his side? He'll be lucky if Severus only slams his door in their faces.But Remus is desperate, and selfish and a hopeless romantic. He hopes, just maybe, this is chance to make things right between them once more.

But this is a queer story written by a queer author!

summaries: Burnt To Ashes By Her Sister as the public called it.It started as a prank, just like the countless others they had played. Harmless fun, or so she thought. This time, however, things took a disastrous turn. The room erupted in fireworks imprisoning them. Celine survived. But her brother was dead.As the child of one of the most prominent pureblood wizarding families in the world, rumours swirled mercilessly, insinuating that she staged her brother's death to claim the family fortune. The desire to be the heir was no secret; it was only a logical leap, they said, that she'd eliminate her competition.Celine wasn't sure if even her family believed her. They sent her to England, to her aunt. Now she is placed in Hogwarts. Rumours follow her as she tries to start a new life and fit into the role of the heiress to her family which she doesn't even want now.- Updates once a week

summaries: Harry Potterille selviää, että hän on velho, kun professori Kalkaros Tylypahkan noitien ja velhojen koulusta tulee vie hänet ostoksille Viistokujalle. Professori on sitä mieltä, ettei Harryn pitäisi enää palata sukulaisilleen. Valitettavasti Tylypahkan rehtori, professori Dumbledore, ei anna muuta vaihtoehtoa, ja Harry vihaa itselleen tuntematonta miestä.Kun Harry saapuu Tylypahkaan ja hänet lajitellaan hänen ensimmäisen ystävänsä perässä Luihuiseen, Harry astuu keskelle velhomaailman kahtia jakamaa poliittista areenaa, jossa valo ja pimeys taistelevat, manipuloivat ja valehtelevat häikäilemättömästi. Onko toisen rehelliset, mutta väkivaltaiset keinot jollain tavalla huonommat kuin toisen salailevat ja manipuloivat? Onko velhomaailman aika katsoa tulevaisuuteen vai pitäisikö sen palata menneisyyteen?Harry etsii omaa paikkaansa maailmassa, jossa hänestä odotetaan valon pelastajaa Iso-Britannian taikamaailman kruunuprinssinä, mutta hän kokee vahvaa vetoa pimeän edustamiin ajatuksiin ja vanhoihin perinteisiin. Onko valoisa taikuus aina hyvää ja pimeä taikuus aina huonoa? Onko taikuus itsessään jollain tapaa hyvää vai huonoa, vai sen takana olevat aikeet? Riippuu täysin siitä, keneltä kysyy.

He would buy his son anything that he needed or asked for. Draco would protect Scorpius through everything and anything. However, secretly, Scorpius was a mischievous little matchmaker, forcing his father and a curly-haired witch  —  whom he’d noticed his father having a fascination with  —  together so that his father could have the perfect happiness that he too deserved.

summaries: While everybody else has been able to move on with their lives after Harry Potter disappeared on the day of the final battle, Hermione feels stuck. She's tried everything she could to forget about her best friend and her secret crush but to no avail. What will happen when she comes back to Hogwarts after twelve years and finds Harry alive and not aged a day?***Harry rubs his eyes with the back of his hand then blinks a few times before he looks right at her, his eyes just as green and full of life as she remembers.“Hermione?” He asks, his voice all scratchy but unquestionably his, Harry’s. “Why did you take an ageing potion?” A strange sound forms in her throat and Harry raises his hand to touch her cheek. “Are you alright?”Hermione shakes her head and squeezes her eyes shut against the hot ache behind them.“You can’t be real.” But even as she says it, his arms reach for her and he holds her close, and she listens to his heart as it beats frantically in his chest, just under where her ear is pressed.

summaries: Reg: You’re… adequate.James: You have a typo in ‘the most beautiful person I’ve ever had the fortune to lay my humble eyes upon.’Reg: Shame your humongous ego utterly ruins the impression.James: My ego’s the perfect size for my body, thank you very much.---Sometimes, life doesn’t go your way, but James Potter wouldn’t say he’s struggling. Not exactly. But after having his heart broken—no, not broken, shattered into a million pieces—by the woman he intended to marry, he swears off dating, determined to overcome the terrible writer’s block that’s been plaguing him ever since he finished the trilogy that earned him international fame and the status of a writing superstar.The problem is, his muse has taped her mouth shut, moved to The Maldives, and refuses to answer his calls.So, when he messages the wrong number by accident, he’s more than happy to distract himself by trading barbed remarks with the mysterious person on the other side. All the better when he learns his new acquaintance is a man. No danger of falling in love. Unfortunately, the stranger hides secrets of his own. Secrets that will force James to re-examine his feelings and put his poor abused heart on the line.

summaries: All events from the Harry Potter books are canon (with exception to the final epilogue chapter of Deathly Hallows)It is ten years past the end of the war. Hermione is a professor at Hogwarts, but is struggling with her own demons of the past.Draco feels lost, desperate for a change and finds himself applying for a position at Hogwarts. He hasn't seen Hermione Granger in ten years, and is astonished to find her at Hogwarts, interviewing him for the position.What will happen if they find themselves both teaching at Hogwarts, sharing a teachers lounge and both fighting their own personal battles? Will they help each other heal, or let each other sink into their separate darknesses?Disclaimer: Harry Potter is the work of J.K. Rowling and is not my intellectual property. summaries: Bartemius Crouch Jr. speaks the unspeakable. He turned sadness, triumph, ecstasy, and anger into words, into something we can comprehend. He was the perfect enigma, a broken boy who didn't seek help because he wore it as admiration and obsession for his beloved. Sharp with words enough, dreadful when it came to love, but if Barty could make anything flawless, it was wickedness. He was a damaged creature that only she could understand and perhaps mend - if only she desired such a thing.

summaries: Sirius Black loves Remus Lupin. Remus Lupin loves Sirius Black. Neither of them know. Both are idiots.Every Valentine's day the single Marauders go on the pull to find someone to go home with; only, for the last 2 of those years, things have changed for Sirius, and he's found himself more and more drawn to his bestie and flatmate, Remus. It's confusing and probably unrequited and any hope he has that it isn't is thwarted on the the big v day when Sirius is passed over on the pull for a stranger.So he, Mary and Peter agree to go on 1 date a week for the next year to improve their exposure to the dating scene and hopefully pair up before the next Valentines Day, but the dating world is cut throat and miserable. Sirius burns out quickly, but lucky for him, he has his erstwhile best mate to come home to to unpack the fuckery of modern dating.Never mind that he's also the love of his life. That's definitely not going to come into the story at all. Right?

summaries: For as long as she’s been alive, the family has never spoken of it, and even if they had, it would have changed nothing...Cressida Lambert is the adopted sister and biological half-cousin of Fleur and Gabrielle Delacour. Born and raised in France, her French mother, a teenager, dies after her birth due to the family shame. Fostered out to the Delacour family, Cressida thrives as their adopted daughter, attends Beauxbatons with Fleur, and dreams of entering one of the Ministries of Magic for employment. In her and Fleur’s seventh-year, they go to Hogwarts for the Triwizard Tournament where she makes friends, discovers secrets, and finds the one wizard she cannot live without.

summaries: Fenrir has resigned himself to a life in Azkaban. He deserves it.But then the youngest Weasley waltzes into his life, telling him she's going to be his mentor and that she's part of a programme to try and rehabilitate former Death Eaters and Voldemort supporters.Despite himself, he is drawn to her, and she to him. Even his wolf likes her, and he can't remember the last time his lunar brother liked anyone. But surely it's all for nothing - he's certain he'll never be able to live a normal life, and anyway, he's bad company.

summaries: The promise of freedom. Redemption. Power. The chance to shake the past off your shoulders, prove your worth, establish your own rules. That's all it took for Regulus, Barty and Evan to trust the Dark Lord.But promises are easy to break. All that glitters is not gold.Regulus made a mistake. He's known it since the day he had to watch James walk away from him after showing him the Dark Mark on his skin. He lost him. Just like his older brother. Just like the family he built during his years at Hogwarts.Two years later, the past is still there to haunt them.Torn apart between a past he’ll never be able to change and a future that now feels so impossible to hold onto, one memory still lingers in Regulus' mind, indelible: James Fleamont Potter. The sun to his moon.The war threatens to crash both of their lives.Regulus has a plan.Deceiving the Dark Lord, destroying his empire and redeeming himself once and for all.Every action has a price to pay.And this time, it could be deadly.~A king and his downfall.A new kingdom rising from the ashes.Nothing will ever be the same.Or will it?

summaries: One year after the Battle of Hogwarts . . .As a way to reclaim the story from She-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named, I'm writing Harry Potter fanfics.This is my fic to heal the trauma of the 7 book series. Almost everything is the same, except two things: 1. Love potions are illegal, so that incident with Lavender Brown and anything else love potion related didn't happen. 2. Teddy Lupin has been aged up a little, and to be fair, I don't know all that much about kids lol. He's a toddler who can talk because I just love Teddy and wanted more of him in here.

summaries: Six years after James and Lily Potter's death, Remus Lupin is tired of Dumbledore telling him no. No, he can't go visit Sirius and find out the truth. No, he can't make the Wizengamot give Sirius a fair trial. No, he can't raise Harry. No, he can't even visit Harry. Remus Lupin is a Gryffindor, and he refuses to be told no anymore. Werewolf or not, Dumbledore's permission or not, Remus Lupin is doing things the Marauder's way. And Marauders make their own rules.

summaries: Lord Voldemort casted the killing curse on Lily Potter and regained consciousness inside a dark cupboard. He looked at a boy crying on a small bed and the boy made eye contact with him. Voldemort froze. Harry Potter.Voldemort... no, Tom slowly regained his humanity. He felt pride, affection, and most of all... a parental sort of love for the boy as he trained and grow closer to him, a desire to protect and guide him to be a marvel of a wizard.A realisation struck Tom like a bolt of lightning. He was not the original Voldemort. He was but a piece of his soul lodged inside Harry Potter's body. Voldemort was somewhere out there still hunting his beloved boy.He decided that he would rise once more. Harry will be safe and happy and Tom will make sure of it. Nothing could stop him now.

summaries: The parchment shook in her hands as she looked at the handwriting she hadn’t seen in years. 9 years, 11 months and 6 days in fact.3,598 days without the guttural panic that coursed through her anytime she saw a small piece of folded parchment with her name inconspicuously inked above the seal.She knew what it was the minute she saw the innocuous appearing letter waiting for her on the desk in her home office. She didn’t question how they had gotten through her wards, or how they had found her. She had known it was inevitable that they would, she had had nearly 10 years undisturbed, and it had been too good to be true.Steeling her resolve, she peeled back the plain wax seal, and using a pencil from the nearby pot, flipped the parchment open.My little lion cub. Post-War, crime mystery, second chance Dreomione.*I do not own any of the properties associated with the Harry Potter Universe*

summaries: “I lied.”“Hmm?” Sirius says, trying desperately to keep his voice steady.“I didn’t get blindsided. They were saying someone was going to be hurt. He was angry. I knew it was going to be me. I could’ve gotten out, but I went anyway.” Sirius feels bile rise in his mouth and he has to steady himself against the sink. Nausea bubbles up in his stomach and he grips on tighter, begging it not to emerge.“Always the martyr, aren’t you?” Sirius whispers, trying to make a soft joke.“Always for a good reason, Sirius. Please trust me. It is.”***After graduating from Hogwarts, Sirius Black had expected glory working with the order, a swift end to the threat plaguing the world around him, and a quiet life with his boyfriend, Remus Lupin. However, his real life has turned into anything but the happy fairytale he envisioned. Not only has the war continued since his graduation, it had gotten bleaker. What's worse? He can feel his boyfriend slipping away from him as he continues going on missions he won't even tell him about. Tasked with what he feels are no other options, he turns to James for help. That is, until said boyfriend walks in the door, and turns his life upside down all over again.

summaries: Aspects of faith and tradition are inlayed throughout the foundation of the modern world. My vision is to expose these qualities through relatable means. Fan fiction is very near and dear to my heart, and so I want to unite what I learn in my faith to a piece of my life that I am deeply passionate about. This work is meant to serve as an instrument in attempting to bridge spirituality with pop culture, revealing the ways in which faith plays a role in how society functions.Unit 1 SacramentalityUnit 2 Grace: Freedom in ActionUnit 3 Signs and Symbols: Food for the JourneyUnit 4 Searching and Longings: God’s Agape LoveUnit 5 God Among Us: God and Humanity, Science and ReligionUnit 6 Responding in Love: Reality is SacredUnit 7 The Mystery of Suffering: The Spiritual Journey of the CrossUnit 8: Vocation: God’s Call to Be Fully HumanUnit 9 Baptism: Death and New Life

summaries: “Quills down, QUILLS DOWN!!!” Granger shrieked, pointing at Draco as he quickly finished the last trivia question. “You cannot count that last question, they were writing after the timer went off!”“Good lord, Granger, are you that concerned you’re about to lose by one point?”“My only concern is that the proper team wins, the team that has followed the rules.” She retorted. Her curls were growing wilder with each passing round, they now looked as if they had taken on a life of their own, Potter had to continually push her hair out of his face. This riled up and rankled Granger just might be Draco’s favourite version of the know-it-all witch.That being said, it might be tied for first place with a flushed and flustered Granger.-----It’s a bit of a Dramione slow burn—wholesome but smutty.Harry and Ginny are wild but bad at feelings.Petty, passionate, and confused in the early post-war years, figuring out who they are, and what they want.Some action, mostly fun fluff.Tentatively capping this at 45 chapters (subject to change as writing/editing progresses).

summaries: Ever since the birth of their son, Draco, Narcissa and Lucius barred a great weight on their shoulders. As Draco grew older, the day loomed in which he would be integrated- without choice- into the Death Eaters Clan. Ever since that day, the neverending loyalty to the Dark Lord has put a great deal of stress on their marriage. As their priorities shifted, they grew apart emotionally and physically. Because of this Lucius has sought strength in solitude, knowing he can't let his lonely heart do his bidding. But, despite being seemingly content with his new reality, Lucius yearned deeply for the closeness of another but he never thought he'd find such comfort within another man.

summaries: Hermione was deep in her thoughts when she heard it. Above the gentle hum of people talking and the cushion of soft snow, a soft familiar tune that pulled her out of the mess she was mulling around in her brain.“Pass me that lovely little gun..”She almost convinced herself she hadn’t heard it. The sound was so soft as it disappeared as quickly as it had reached her, replaced by voices of patrons in the businesses she passed. Until she walked a few more steps down the road and found herself outside of a modest pub when the lullaby reached her ears again.“My dear, my darling one..the cleaners are coming one by one..You don’t even let them start..”A story of healing and learning to understand love and the journeys we take to find it.

summaries: The Ministry holding cells were, Draco supposed, like the Cloudhopper training broom he’d had as a child to the Nimbus 2001 of the Azkaban cells. They were clammy and cold, but not glacial. Dingy, but not filthy. Stifling, but not suffocating. Meagre, but not barren. Callous, but not cruel. Depressing, but not nightmarish.-Draco Malfoy has resigned himself to his inevitable fate in the wake of the war; a cell in Azkaban, likely for the remainder of his life. He sees no point in fighting it, but an unlikely someone has decided for fight for him. Now, it's time for him to learn to fight for himself.

summaries: This time, her encounter with Harry Potter was not so easy to write off, as it had been at that Ministry event a few years ago. It was not an easy thing to put from her mind, though Pansy thought it would be more convenient if she did. His broad shoulders and soft touch followed her back to her family’s flat. She grew curiously warm as she thought about the way the muscles in his forearm had flexed as he’d rolled up his sleeve.But what she thought about most, as she tried to sleep that night, was his eyes.She’d never seen someone with such kindness in their eyes before.

summaries: The end of the Wizarding War left a traumatic scar upon the English Wizarding World. Scores of Witches and Wizards had fled the country, many more had fought and died, or been locked away in prisons, both physical and otherwise. However, some of the deepest wounds left by the war came after the final spell had been cast, and they came from the most unlikely place.Harry Potter is the symbol of Wizarding England's hope and prayers, a symbol of the ability to recover from a traumatic conflict.Daphne Greengrass is the pureblood heiress whose drive and contempt for inaction could drag her family into a whole new mess.And Stephanie Scamander? She's the girl whose story doesn't quite line up.

summaries: Two years. Two years as a slave to that hideous man. Two years of his life that he would never forget, branded with an evil mark, and thrust into something he was not remotely prepared for: fatherhood. Raising the newest Malfoy heir is anything but easy, especially when there are still countless Death Eaters on the loose, coming for the Malfoy family. Of those, the most dangerous of them, Antonin Dolohov. With a dangerous man on the loose and death threats coming from both sides Draco must do all in his power to protect the child he loves so dearly. However, there is a plan brewing within the ranks of death eaters free from the mental torture of Azkaban. With Dolohov at large, no one is safe if his plans come to fruition, specifically not the heir to the Malfoy name.

He feels it in his arm when his mother squeezes it a little harder than a mother should. He felt it, the water rising in his throat, when his brother slipped out the window and into the night. He often wonders if it'd be easier to just let himself sink.He often wonders if he has a choice.—-Or, Regulus is sent to Hogwarts with a special mission from the Dark Lord himself. He does his best to juggle everyone’s expectations- but it’s harder than it sounds.

summaries: COMING SOONSix years since the battle of Hogwarts. Six years since Voldemort killed Harry Potter. Six years since the remaining members of the Order of the Phoenix went into hiding.Hermione Granger has finally learned how to embed spells into objects, equipping herself with the highest form of protection she could in her changed world: the erasure of her muggle birth. Everyone she crosses paths with now believes she is the daughter of purebloods, and forgets her association with the Order, all due to a little ring she wears on a chain around her neck.Sent out to gather intel for the Order, she is now regarded as a valuable young wizard in the Death Eater's world, the young genius, the future of the purebloods, and the perfect bride for the Death Eater's most beloved prince, Draco Malfoy.

summaries: Post-war life isn’t exactly how Hermione Granger thought it would be. She’s stuck on her way up the Ministry ladder working as the liaison to the Department for Digital Media, Culture and Sport in Muggle England. Losing herself amongst art, artifacts, and books in the National Gallery, British Museum and British Library should be the perfect job. However, when Draco Malfoy crashes back into her life (and seems to be a completely different person than she remembers), Hermione questions everything. A rash of forgeries pours into the Gallery and Draco is tasked to sort them out. It isn’t that he has to stay with Hermione as part of a work housing exchange, or that he’s a bad house guest. It’s the stirring dreams she started having about him that are causing the most havoc.When Harry Potter is hexed with an unknown life-draining curse, it’s up to Hermione and her unlikely companion, Draco, to save him. Racing through museums, trudging through the British countryside, and seeking shelter in an abandoned cabin to find the mythical Ring of Dispel, the two skirt the line between history and legend. Will they be able to uncover the cause of Harry’s curse in time to save him?

summaries: Elora Townes is a 7th year Slytherin, looking forward to restarting her final year at Hogwarts after the brutal destruction of the war. She finds herself anticipating this to be the best year yet, with friends by her side and a fire in her heart.That fire soon turns to something else as Elora navigates her complicated relationships with friends who are not so friendly, as well as some of her once-feared superiors. One small mistake pushes her to make life-altering choices as her fate slowly slips into the hands of others. With her control over herself lost, Elora falls into the hands of the Dark Lord, who is more than willing to put her gifts to great use. She finds herself having to face some pretty fierce consequences.While this story follows many original plot lines of the Harry Potter stories, many aspects have been altered for the purpose of this book. summaries: Percy Jackson knows nothing about who he is.Percy Jackson just lost everything.In 1993, Percy Jackson has just discovered he is a demigod and is sent on a quest to retrieve the weapon of Zeus, king of the gods, who is blaming him for stealing it. Unknown to Percy, that is not the most important thing to happen to him that summer. When he meets Sirius Black upon waking up in the infirmary, Percy's whole life shifts to a new trajectory.In 2001, Percy Jackson has just lost his husband. Sirius Black has been sentenced to life in Azkaban without a trial. Percy desperately misses his husband, but he can't focus on that. Harry Potter, Sirius' godson and blood-adopted child, has been taken and hidden by Albus Dumbledore, the same man who sent Sirius to Azkaban. Percy doesn't trust Dumbledore's intentions and will do anything to save Harry from the old man's manipulations.

summaries: Genevieve Granger has only been known as Hermione Granger's twin sister and the lesser half of the Golden Girl.Now that it is six years after the Battle of Hogwarts, the wizarding world had experienced a period of relative peace and rebuilding. However, dark magic and loyalists to Voldemort's cause still lingered in the shadows and incidences over the past year had made everyone realize that the second part of the war is coming. It has been traveling for some time and now it has arrived.The resurgence of dark forces is back. Harry Potter is alive. Voldemort is still alive.And Genevieve hopes to save her sister on her path to Redemption, but the way she gets there is certainly unexpected when she must learn to work with Voldemort's Sacred Four.

summaries: Em Fantasmas, o destino tece uma trama intricada que une Narcisa e Lucius Malfoy em uma jornada de redenção, perdão e amor incondicional.Após uma década de separação, Narcisa e Lucius Malfoy são obrigados a se reunir em razão da morte trágica de seu filho Draco, renegado herdeiro da família, e de sua nora Hermione, quem Lucius nunca aceitou.O reencontro traz à tona emoções enterradas e segredos guardados, pois ao escolher o filho sobre o próprio marido, Narcisa selou o divórcio não oficial com o marido.Agora, forçados a encarar a realidade que o filho um dia tão esperado faleceu precocemente Lucius e Narcisa confrontam não apenas suas diferenças passadas, mas também os fantasmas do presente. Enquanto lutam para reconciliar o passado e enfrentar os desafios do presente, descobrem que o amor que um dia compartilham ainda queima tão forte quanto antes.Entre as tensões familiares e as memórias de um passado doloroso, Narcisa e Lucius encontram uma segunda chance para reconstruir sua família dilacerada. Afinal “En esta casa no existen fantasmas, Son puros recuerdos de tiempos ajenos”

summaries: ‘We’ve been hit. Again.’ James stormed into the captain’s quarters.‘Shit,’ He looked up at his first mate, ‘What’s the damage?’‘Four water barrels, about a week’s worth of food, a little rope but nothing too precious...’Sirius sighed, bending over his desk and resting his head in his hands – the nautical maps he had been sketching left unattended, his fingers blackened with charcoal.‘Alright,’ he roused himself. ‘We’ll make port as soon as we can to restock supplies. Try and keep the crew calm for now. We’ll be alright.’ORThe Noble House of Black are in violent control over the seas and are trying their hardest not to let their runaway heir forget about his roots. summaries: Joe had grown up chasing. Through the fields of his childhood home, he and his brother rushing through the tall grass, calling out to each other through the clear, warm air. Chasing his father’s truck as it drove down the gravel path of the dark, London house he’d been put in. Chasing his stepmother, looking for acceptance but simply being met with scolding or a slap to the cheek. Chasing, gripping at the memories of his mother that were slowly fading the more and more he thought deeply about her.He’d chased and chased his family for their approval, attention, their warm embrace. He’d never gotten it.Hogwarts had been a blessing in disguise.Or,Joe is fighting to be top of his class at Hogwarts, as well as bring home the House Cup to Hufflepuff. And yet, Shorty Hunt, a naturally smart and skilled Ravenclaw, won't stop getting in the way.

summaries: Long ago, sixteen-year-old Vera Bell reluctantly accepted her existence as a squib. Resigning herself to continue the beast conservation work left by her late father, she receives the shock of a lifetime when her magic suddenly manifests in an unusual way.Finally following the dream she had long abandoned, Vera arrives at Hogwarts and contends with new friendships, new discoveries, and new feelings. Finding close friends in Ominis Gaunt and Sebastian Sallow, as well as others, she begins a journey that will take her beyond the limits of what she could have ever imagined.Past comes to meet present in unexpected ways, and with the support of her friends Vera confronts a growing threat that revolves around them all. Features canon-divergence, updates 2-3 times per week.

summaries: Sirius Black est l'héritier de le Noble et Ancienne Maison des Black et il a un problème. Le genre de problème dont il ne peut se débarrasser et qui l'empêche de mener une existence normale, le genre de problème qui pourrait le forcer à tuer ses amis. Sirius a toujours cru fermement qu'il était un monstre, et que personne dans ce monde ne pourrait jamais le comprendre. Jusqu'à ce qu'il rencontre Remus Lupin.Ceci est une fanfiction écrite à l'époque des Marauders. Je ne suis pas la chronologie inventée par JK Rowling mais celle de la fiction All The Young Dudes-Sirius Perspective. Je m'inspire grandement de cette fiction et de l'originale (All The Young Dudes) mais avec mon propre twist à l'histoire.

summaries: Theodore Nott has gotten tired of hiding in the shadows. The game is changing, they're making new connections, and the war is approaching at a much too rapid pace.Voldemort is back, but they want nothing to do with him and his Death Eaters. They have friends to protect and their own ambitions to feed. Ambitions that would never tolerate serving a wannabe Dark Lord.So Theo makes their moves. They've hidden their talents until now - skills nobody would expect a fifteen year old to possess. It's time they take a stand, and it's time the world learns just what happens when they try to hurt the people they care about.And if they have to tear the Ministry down in the process... So be it.

summaries: During the summer before his third year of School, Harry leaves his home to escape from his awful relatives. While cooling his head he gets scooped up by a passing Mind Flayer Nautiliod and before he knows what's going on he's got a tadpole added to his head. Luckily his magic offers him some protection from getting his brain eaten and his body transformed into a brain eating tentacle monster. Unluckily that tadpole isn't going anywhere. Now Harry must escape from the Illithid colony and get back home. And that's the easy part. The hard part will be navigating his magical education without anyone realizing his mind has a new passenger with new powers all the while dark forces are beginning to rise in the magical world.Also is it just him, or is the tadpole starting to talk some sense about the benefits of having a hive mind watching over society?

summaries: Set 20 years ahead of canon, starts 1994To an outsider, Lily Evans might seem to be quite a simple girl. She was a muggleborn student in her fourth year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, top of the class in all her subjects, save Potions, and she spent damn near every waking moment in the library.But as the Wizarding World ramps up for a war that risks exposing them all, Lily has to fight much more mundane battles, she'll grapple with love, failing friendships and most of all, proving she belongs within the hidden world that holds her heart and her future. As the political landscape causes everyone at Hogwarts to choose a side, Lily too has to decide who she wants to move forward in life with and who she must leave behind.

summaries: It's almost 8 years since The Battle of Hogwarts and Hermione Granger and Draco Malfoy are married... to other people. Having both pushed the trauma of the wizarding war behind them, they are both looking to rebuild their lives and create new legacies. Hermione is steadily climbing the ranks of the Ministry of Magic under Kinglsey Shacklebolt while Draco Malfoy, in need of a chance to redeem his spirit and name, takes a job in the Shacklebolt administration.Working closely together, Draco and Hermione create a bond they never knew they needed. Both of them are in loveless marriages with people who don't meet their emotional, physical, or intellectual needs and slowly, they realize they can't fight the magnetic force that keeps pulling them together.And all the pieces fallRight into placeGetting caught up in a momentLipstick on your face(So it goes)I'm yours to keepAnd I'm yours to loseYou know I'm not a bad girlBut I do bad things with you(So it goes)-Taylor Swift

summaries: Ever since she was tortured by Bellatrix in Malfoy Manor, Hermione Granger has been labouring under a curse that has caused her to see and hear things that aren't there. Rodolphus LeStrange, freshly released from Azkaban makes an offer she can't refuse: find the dagger and he will lift the curse. As the pair begins the hunt for the dagger they learn that not everything is as it seems, and there is more evil than just the curse of the dagger. Can Hermione find a cure before she dies? Or will someone finish the job that Bellatrix started?

summaries: One with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches... and the Dark Lord shall mark him as his equal, but he shall have power the Dark Lord knows not...What if the power Harry possessed was the ability to see and wield Ancient Magic, just as Percival Rackham and Isidora Morganach did long ago?However, that ability comes with a caveat, a sacrifice. As the magical core develops the ability to see and wield Ancient Magic, it remains dormant until 15, not producing any signs of accidental magic until this time, causing the wielder to be unable to use magic until their mid-teens. How would this change Harry Potter's life and all of the Wizarding World?Join me as I explore this tantalizing mystery of Ancient Magic and the life of Harry Potter.

summaries: Myra LeStrange, a thirteen year old sorceress, hated everything about her life. Her biological parents are mass murderers and her foster family treated her like a freak. That was, until she received the letter.Most Hogwarts students must go to Hogwarts for their first year before they can go to any of the higher years. Dumbledore, for whatever unknown reason, chose to place Myra in with the third years under the new name of 'Charlotte Ravenstone'. To her surprise, she is in the same year as Harry Potter. Coincidence? Or perhaps a much more powerful force... fate. But can she escape the fate her parents received? Or will she finally be able to break free from her past and prove she's more than her parents puppet?

summaries: She'd loved him from afar, deeply and truly. But not all love is healthy, not all love should be shared. Love can be painful, bleed and wound. Leaving marks where no one would ever see, if anyone ever bothered to dig.Harry Potter had always been most familiar with a love that was poisonous. That spread its roots until the victim could only suffer silently, until their heart stopped beating. Until they were but a husk of who they once were, left to the mercy of what had become abomination. Losing its fairytale moniker of love.Ginny had felt deep affection for him, once. But she'd crossed the line, and whatever she felt- whatever excuse she called this thing- it was not love.Harry had a long road ahead of him. One that would lead him to this very realisation. One that might, finally, bring him a truly happy ending.

summaries: Hermione knew the danger of reading a diary. With the possession of Ginny in second year, she thought she would never be stupid enough to read one, yet here she was, reading about the life of a man she had never met. Reading about the life of a sixteen year old Death Eater who never wanted the mark to begin with.Regulus Arcturus Black. RAB.His written words kept her going while on the run and made her see that bravery is not the sole property of The Order of the Phoenix, Gryffindor House, or even “The Side of the Light”.When the Battle of Hogwarts is lost, and The Order is fractured beyond repair, a surprising chance to change the course of time is thrust upon her by fate. Now, she is surrounded by ghosts, and even worse, the living breathing man who haunted all her thoughts. When she feels the farthest thing from brave, she reminds herself:“Be brave like Regulus”Time-Travel Fic.

summaries: Si había algo que Regulus odiaba era la violencia.Irónico ¿cierto?Considerando el entorno en que se movía era casi una broma pesada que pensara de esa forma. La violencia en su hogar, la violencia en los negocios que manejaba, la violencia del mundo a través de sus ojos.La violencia que había en él.Regulus la odiaba.Pero como siempre, sobrevivía a ella.Regulus luchó por sobrevivir después de que Sirius se fue. Regulus mordió, arañó y arrancó para llegar hasta donde está ahora.Él tenía una vida hecha, una vida envuelta en violencia silenciosa y audaz. Regulus no quiere más de eso, pero entonces Sirius aparece.Y no aparece solo, junto con él viene James Potter.Quien se llevó a su hermano de su lado, quien ejerce un grado diferente de violencia subiendose a un ring y peleando.James lleva la violencia en sus puños pero no la lleva en la sangre. James brilla después de cada pelea, James sonríe sin malicia, James se ve feliz y contento.Regulus lo odia.

summaries: 10 pm. Hog’s Head. Bring your friend.That's all that was written in the note mysteriously left on James's porch that morning. Now, with Sirius at his side, he finds himself in some shady bar at a quarter to 10 watching the next band set up. Well, specifically, he watches the lead singer, because even as a darkened silhouette, James can't get over how those hands grip the microphone in front of them.It’s funny, but the longer he looks at him, the more he swears that he looks almost exactly like Siri–The lights slowly flare up, covering the entire stage in a deep, emerald green that sweeps away the shadows from before. The singer’s face is eerily lit, mapping out high cheekbones, cold, brown eyes, and a sharp cupid’s bow.Oh fuck, it’s-Sirius spits out his drink. “Is that my brother?”

summaries: The battle of Hogwarts was won. But instead of dying, what was left of Voldemort's soul fled his lifeless body, implying that not all Horcuxes had been found and destroyed. As a result, the Dark Lord's followers have not yielded and the war has raged on for close to two years. The Minstry of Magic and St. Mungo's are still in Death Eater hands, while the Order of the Phoenix uses Hogwarts as a base.Busy with research about the elusive last Horcrux, Hermione finds herself equally relieved and annoyed when she is tasked with a seemingly simple errand.Well, what can go wrong standing at a crossroads after 02:00, with instructions of bringing Harry's old invisibility cloak, provisions, and a very cryptic message from 'Mad-Eye'?Turns out: A lot.  “Do you make a habit of barging into people’s personal spaces, Granger? Or am I just lucky?” Malfoy’s voice was icy and when Hermione turned to face him, he stood in the living-space, his arms crossed, looking every bit as arrogant as she’d ever seen him.“Hgnh,” came her dignified reply.He raised a brow. “Indeed.”   One tent.One bed.One supposed enemy to share both with.No magic.

summaries: Elizabeth Harries just turned 22, and she's unhappy with her life. The power of ancient magic escapes her control, forcing her to figure that the only solution is to lead an anonymous life, off the radar of the Ministry of Magic. Her companions have found their way, their personal success, while she struggles to hide the gift she has received but never wanted for herself, and works at a well known bookshop in Diagon Alley.It's only when on Halloween night, 1896, she encounters Sebastian Sallow after six years, that something awakens in her: the awareness of her own power, her dormient Slytherin ambition, the desire for redemption and knowledge, but mostly for control over her own life, her own destiny and her powers.

summaries: From the outside, Hermione Granger has everything: a Hogwarts degree, guaranteed Ministry position, and fateful romance with Ron Weasley. But when her relationship deteriorates and she has a strange encounter with a Seer, Hermione decides to escape from it all by accepting a postgraduate Magizoology fellowship in Baile Herculane, Romania.She soon discovers that the remote hot spring town is home to both dragons and Charlie Weasley, the second-eldest brother of the ex she left in England. A flame with the experience and patience to tame her wild heart.It seems like a closed book… at least until Hermione's childhood bully-turned-secret confidant Draco Malfoy arrives and finds new ways to torture her during a holiday visit—an escape from reality which quickly extends when he falls for more than the charming Romanian town.As the seasons change, Hermione becomes increasingly caught in a fight between a dragon tamer and a dragon. Forced to choose to either break a family apart, or enter a hostile, pure-blood society. Tempted into submission, and seduced into the promise of being burned.All while living in the shadow of a prophecy about her one true soulmate.

summaries: Le WriYe,Quoicé ?Cette année encore, c'est WriYe. Pour ceux qui connaissent pas, c'est comme le nano, mais sur une année, avec l'objectif que vous voulez. Pour ceux qui connaissent pas le nano, c'est écrire une nouvelle de 50k en 1 mois. Le WriYe, c'est écrire tous les jours sans faute pendant un an.Donc on va commencer et tenter d'aller au bout avec des petites one shot, voir des drabble, un par jour. N'hésitez pas à envoyer vos mots de prompts (des mots indépendants. Pas des phrases). Pour l'instant, je commence sur du YYMDoE, mais rien n'empeche que je parte sur d'autres fandom.

summaries: Ginny Weasley escapes her small village of Ottery St. Catchpole only to discover the financial cost of a Hogwarts education. From tuition to housing, she’s facing a mountain of debt. Short on money, but not machinations, she strikes up a scheme to rent out her apartment to peers in need of a private place for sex and other things—but mostly sex. It's almost the perfect plan.But , you see, there's this girl. Hermione Granger. And Ginny can't take her eyes off her. A few chance encounters and suave attempts at flirtation, or so Ginny would delude herself to believe, and they find a friendship that's sure to blossom into a romance for the movies.Enter Ginny's Moral philosophy professor, Severus Snape who wants exclusive use of her Apartment in exchange for an A in class and a guaranteed paid job as his T.A. next term. It’s a better deal than the one that has her nightly wandering while strangers romp about in her place. Or so she believes, until she learns that Snape's bringing Hermione to her apartment.

summaries: 'You can't,' Remus said. 'It's past curfew.'Potter and Black exchanged looks.'You're right, of course,' Potter said.'What were we thinking,' Black continued.'We weren't thinking,' Potter corrected.'No, but Lupin was,' Black agreed.'Alright then, we better get ready for bed,' Potter said, grinning at Black.'Nothing's like a good night of sleep,' Black nodded sincerely before he grinned back.---James had always wanted a sibling or a best friend; Sirius had always wanted a family he could love; Peter had always wanted someone who would look out for him; and Remus just wanted to be normal.This is a very long, canon-compliant fic exploring the life of the marauders and other key characters that went (or might have gone) to Hogwarts in the 1970s.Because it’s canon-compliant, James and Sirius will not always be easy to love. Follow them as their talent and confidence outgrows their maturity, but also, eventually, that their maturity catches up.

summaries: Hermione has always been the brains of the Golden Trio, but how much is she willing to sacrifice in order to save Harry and conquer the Dark Lord? When she gets the news that she'll be expected to marry Professor Snape to not only protect herself, but also serve as another double agent for The Order, she's unsure how to cope with all that is expected of her. What would they be required to do as a married couple? What she doesn't expect, is the turn of events that occurs throughout their time of working so closely together over the several years. Will she come to have feelings for the once stone-cold professor who made fun of her all those years? If she did, would there even be a chance that it would be reciprocated? Regardless, there is no option of failure, for the entire well-being of their world is at stake.

summaries: What precisely happens when a spark turns to a flame? It is 18:16 in the afternoon on a sunny late September Saturday in 1928, and Albus Dumbledore has once more done the unthinkable – attach himself lips-first to the man who happens to be the love of his life, and his biggest enemy simultaneously.Although, this, of course, is a lie. They are neither, and both, and so much less, and so much more. They ARE. They are! They are... something? Well, Gellert Grindelwald quite certainly knows what they are, and are to be. So does Albus. Pity, only, that these two [imbeciles] never do have a heart-to-heart to see whether their opinions for once actually align...Accompany them as they fool the ministries on numerous occasions, break people out of prison, fight for the rights of Lycanthropes, dance at a variety of balls, explore the concept of exile, eat, of course, numerous delicacies, make ground-breaking discoveries, commit crimes and do right by people, meet old friends and make new enemies, and just overall somehow stay alive through it all.But beware: Not all fae-tale stories have a happy ending...

summaries: Meet Eliza Thorne, a muggleborn witch with the ability to use ancient magic. Looking for a feral, feisty female main character with her heart on the sleeve and a short temper? You will love her!In the spring of 1898, a dream comes true for Eliza. The former Gryffindor student starts her career as an auror at the Ministry of Magic. She has spent the last five years working with Poppy for the American Association for Magical Beasts in France.Now, back in England, she runs into her old Hogwarts friend Sebastian, who vanished from her life in autumn 1893 with a farewell letter. After they sorted things out, they start working on a really interesting case, involving Dark Magic.The case and the revelations that come with it puts Eliza, Sebastian and everyone else to a test, that will change their lives forever. A dark power arises from the shadows and threatens to destroy the world as we know it.

summaries: Hermione wants nothing more than to never see Hogwarts again but as she yearns to move forward with her life, the mandatory return of all 8th-year students and the announcement of the year-long Unity Project, called the Scavenger Hunt, adds more weight to her already full mental load. To make matters worse, she's paired with her worst enemy, Draco Malfoy.As the year unfolds, they find themselves facing the challenge of healing together or breaking apart. The Unity Project becomes a crucible that tests not only their ability to work together but also their resilience and capacity for personal growth. Hermione grapples with her own internal struggles while navigating the complexities of her relationship with Draco. The journey promises to be tumultuous, forcing them to confront their pasts and forge a path toward redemption or dissolution.

At the age of 5, while looking up at the night sky, she saw a shooting star and made a wish, Jirachi heard her wish and decided to make it come true. The next day, she wakes up in the world of Pokémon, she's found and adopted by a couple.Years later, during her journey through Johto she's sent to Hogwarts by lady magic, to watch her Sinnoh journey. While reuniting with her former family.. How will the Wizarding World react to the missing Potter or the fact she's a squib? How will she react when she see her old family again? summaries: Summary: Denis Novikov, a Russian director, finds his star for his movie, Severus Snape, a boy who he thought would be the perfect person to play his character Catharine. The boy's porcelain white skin, deep brown eyes almost black, his shoulder length hair, his long and dainty figure. Severus was unsure if playing a female character as a male would be acceptable, but Denis convinced him that he was going to be all right. summaries: Post-war, Severus Snape returns to Hogwarts a free, but still broken, man. He’s trying to move on and throws himself into potions once again. A strange request and a vague piece of research send him to the USA to retrieve a possible missing link for a difficult potion. Unfortunately, he knows he is out of his element, and requests the help of a guide in finding it. Erica Crawford is hired as his guide, a not so southern belle of a witch with her own secrets and demons. Their time spent together in the wilderness although entirely too brief, healed parts of them neither expected to heal. They cross paths again and the secrets are flung into the open for all to see, much to the amusement of a still living Albus Dumbledore and the rest of the Hogwarts staff. Snape is eventually pulled into a world he thought he left behind. What could go wrong?

summaries: Diana Noctua has more than enough reasons to fear the magical world, but when she finds herself entering Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as a fifth-year, she can no longer postpone the inevitable.Though registered as muggle-born, Diana secretly belongs to one of the oldest and most powerful magical families in the U.S., a family that doesn't take kindly to its members escaping their clutches. Newly orphaned and thrust into the world she's been hiding from for years, Diana seeks to avoid detection, but by the end of the year, the business with Ranrok has already garnered too much attention.Will the two Slytherin boys she meets help her navigate the secrets of this new magical world? Can she trust them with the secrets of her own magical history? Will the reach of her true family be long enough to span the ocean separating her from her birth country?HL story set in 1890, but with modern viewpoints on modesty, language, sexuality, propriety, equality etc. Some tweaking of canon for 5th year with expansion on known events with original 6th and 7th years, and beyond planned. Spoilers for game.

summaries: Et si Harry avait eu le temps de grandir, avant la nuit où Voldemort trouva les Potter ?Cela fait douze ans que James échappe à Voldemort avec son fils. Mais douze années de répit peuvent mener au pire. Certains ont changés de camp, d'autres ont disparus. Et lorsque le drame survient, il n'a plus rien à voir avec ce qu'il aurait dû être. Harry découvre d'autres secrets, d'autres guerres... et Voldemort demande leur aide aux Potter. Harry doit le fuir, seul, alors que Voldemort est en passe d'asseoir sa domination sur toute l'Europe.Toute l'Europe? Non. Reste un lieu si dangereusement magique que même le Ministère n'a jamais pu le soumettre au moindre contrôle. Les sept mers. Harry échoue sur le bateau du capitaine Black. Harry ne veut pas de Sirius, pas plus qu'il ne veut être vendu, ou même devenir Seigneur des Mers. Pourtant, propulsé dans un monde de bateaux vivants, de Buveurs de Tempêtes et de magies oubliées, il n'a d'autre choix que de devenir pirate pour survivre.Mais le destin a de curieux jeux. Qui aurait cru que c'était en mer, que reposait les pouvoirs et les secrets ancestraux de la très ancienne lignée Potter?

summaries: “Hullo Malfoy,” Ron said with a grimace. “Take a seat, will you? You’re not going to like this.”“I thought as much.” Malfoy smiled, an understated, wry thing, and pulled a chair up to Ron’s desk so that they were facing each other. “So what is it? Evil deeds need sniffing out in Rotherham? Anti-muggle sentiment requires some artificial stoking in deepest, darkest Doncaster?”“I don’t think evil misdeeds only happen up north,” Ron pointed out. He had intended it as a sort of half-joke but Malfoy’s lips stayed pressed shut. “But no, it’s none of that. It’s... actually, it’s quidditch.”

Or rather, a female counterpart named Hava.Now, don't get me wrong, I'm usually (or was) pretty chill.But, I don't know how you would react, but spending ten years under the fucking Dursleys after watching my mother be fucking murdered in front of me messed me up pretty badly.So, after ten years of hell, I decide that I really, really don't have any fucks to give, and why not spend the majority of my second life having fun and causing (mostly) harmless chaos?Course, while a noble goal, it's kinda hard when you've got a megalomaniac super-villain out for your blood.Too bad the 'power of love' isn't something you can bottle up and throw at him. summaries: Sirius Black is only getting his doctorate in ancient literature because his family forced it on him. It’s what the Black family does. Back alley deals of lost artifacts worth more money than God. There’s nothing more to it. Or so he thinks.~Remus Lupin holds this PHD cohort every two years for one reason and one reason only - obligation and a silly hope that the one he seeks will someday walk through his classroom door.He feels it immediately when Sirius Black sits before him at a small desk. The thrumming. It’s not just attraction, or his snippy fucking attitude. It’s a call, stronger than anything he’s ever felt. He thought he’d have known if a Black heir was the key to it all. The one he’s been searching for his entire life, like many have searched for generations before him.~Neither of them will understand how important the other is until it’s almost too late.~Or, a modern muggle/magical realism AU where Sirius Black holds the key to a lost ancient power

summaries: What they tell you is that, fate is a fickle thing. So is magic, and so is love.It's been a decade since Voldemort perished, freeing the Wizarding World of the evil. But when dementors appear on the school grounds out of nowhere, more questions arise. Is the world really safe? Adam Parrish wouldn't necessarily agree. Well, soon enough Adam Parrish and everybody else around him are thrown in this mess.Fates are discovered and secrets revealed, so are hidden allies who want magic to thrive and dangerous foes who want the pure-blood families to reign supreme. And the old halls and psychics speak of a prophecy and another Chosen One, who equilibriates between the light and the dark. But what happens when the dark engulfs the light? What happens when the light goes out?What they tell you is that, fate is a fickle thing. So is magic, and so is love. But what they don't tell you is that, they often clash and collide. And you have to let them.Alternatively, a TRC x Harry Potter AU with all of our favourite gangs thrown in a magical adventure together.*Completely written, updates every weekend!

summaries: Tom Riddle was back. Oh how he loathes this place. Wool's Orphanage. Just one last time. This would be a new beginning. This would be the moment that would usher in the start of his Legacy. All he had to do was walk back in there, take care of business and then he could leave on his Global Journey. When he returned to these shores a decade later he would begin to make his moves and change their world.This was the next phase in his plan, but sometimes Fate throws something at your plans. Good thing the rising Dark Lord has a talent for tweaking things to his liking. He's about to embark on the next chapter of his life. Make no mistake, he was still going to become a Lord of his own making, but it's not going to happen exactly how he had intended.And that will change everything.Because what can happen when a man, setting out to create his own Legacy, meets someone unexpected and chooses to do the unexpected? A family is made and it changes the path to greatness. The plan was to build his Legacy and he will achieve it. It may look a bit different, but it will be better than he ever imagined.

summaries: Abigail Figg has been watching the Dursleys for over six years now. She has repeatedly contacted Albus about the bruises she sees on Harry’s thin frame or the long hours of back breaking work she sees him do in the garden. The chores she sees him do daily, that would be too much for even an adult, and the even more concerning welts on his back she sometimes sees peeking out from under his too large clothes. But time and again Albus puts her off with paltry platitudes of building character. When the “family” leaves Harry standing on the curb with a black eye while they drive off to a vacation in Paris, she has had enough.When Snape makes a house call to a local Squib for a rare wizarding sickness, he finds his quiet life of solitude turned upside down. His previous years of spy work under the dark lord look like child’s play compared to harboring the-boy-who-lived right under the headmaster’s wrinkled nose.

summaries: Voldemort n'est pas mort, la bataille de Poudlard a seulement menée à la destruction de tous les horcruxes, depuis il fait profil bas. Une partie de l'armée de Dumbledore prend le chemin du ministère pour devenir auror·e·s. C'est donc quasi un an et demi plus tard, que Harry se retrouve à enquêter sur la disparition du monstre du Loch Ness. Ce qui sonnait comme une plaisanterie semble en fait être la partie émergée d'un gigantesque iceberg qui pourrait causer le naufrage de la société sorcière britannique. Naufrage déjà bien entamé pour Drago Malefoy qui lutte chaque jour pour survivre aux côtés du seigneur des Ténèbres mais qui rêve de s'échapper d'une façon ou d'une autre.Les jeunes sorciers devront affronter un mage noir encore plus puissant et mettre rapidement au point un nouveau plan s'ils veulent survivre, mais cette fois ils seront leurs propres guides à travers les affres de la vie et de la mort.

summaries: Der Krieg ist verloren und Harry Potter tot.Hogwarts ist kein Ort der Liebe und Sicherheit mehr, sondern eine Schule dominiert von Lehrern, die eigentlich Voldemorts Schergen sind. Hunderte Kilometer entfernt lebt Draco Malfoy in einer arrangierten Ehe und während er die Misserfolge seines Vaters beim dunklen Lord wieder gut macht, werden die engsten Freunde von Potter aus Askaban entlassen, wo sie eine zehnjährige Strafe für ihren Verrat an Voldemort absitzen mussten. Gezeichnet von der Haft und immer noch in ihrer tiefen Trauer gefangen, ist es Hermine, die trotz allem an den Ort zurückkehren möchte, an dem ihr bester Freund hingerichtet wurde. Sie hofft auf eine Stelle als Lehrerin. Nicht nur weil sie Schülern wieder Mut machen möchte, sondern auch weil sie einen Plan hat. Niemals hätte sie gedacht, dass sie sich noch einmal mit dem Menschen konfrontiert sehen würde, der ihre Freunde schonungslos verraten hatte.

Od dziecka wychowywany w przekonaniu, że jest człowiekiem niezwykłym. Natomiast mugole to jednostki zwykłe, których na tym świecie jest zdecydowanie zbyt wiele. Dlatego jego największym marzeniem zostało dołączenie do Czarnego Pana, aby zmienić ten stan rzeczy. Niestety jego idea musiała w końcu zderzyć się z rzeczywistością. Zabijając swoją pierwszą ofiarę poczuł jakby tak naprawdę zabił samego siebie. Czy to oznacza, że jest taką samą zdradziecką wszą jak Syriusz?Jakby miał dość problemów wplątuje się w dziwną relację z byłą kandydatką na narzeczoną jego brata. Sonia na pierwszy rzut oka wydająca się idealną czystokrwistą czarownicą, za wszelką cenę próbuje pomóc Regulusowi się zmienić. Jednak okazuje się, że ona również skrywa brudny sekret. summaries: Olive Cole is in her seventh and final year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is determined to pass her N.E.W.T.'s and to start studying to be a Healer. After losing her best friend, and fellow Hufflepuff, Cedric Diggory, she has decided to bury herself in her studies, but the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher is making that rather difficult. She is invited to join a secret 'study group' by George Weasley, a boy in her year who's constant pranking made it very hard for Olive to focus in class at times.Little do they know that their lives have always been, and always will be, connected by some invisible string--a single thread of gold that binds their lives, and souls together.

summaries: Hermione Granger understands being unwanted. The unwanted child conceived by two busy people at the height of their careers and shunted off on the first person they can find, Hermione spends the year leading up to her First Year at Hogwarts being hidden away and raised by a majority of the Hogwarts staff right under Dumbledore's nose.Stumbling across the Potions classroom early on, she develops a kinship to Professor Snape. Throughout her first few years at Hogwarts, whenever she is on the outs with Harry and Ron for one reason or another she often times retreats to the Potions lab to find peace and safety in a school where she otherwise feels utterly alone most of the time, even amongst the people she considers friends.At the end of fourth year she, Ginny, and Luna stumble through a door on the 7th floor that dumps them 20 years back in time to spring 1975, when the Mauraders ruled the school. Hermione again finds comfort in Severus, though now they are the same age and in the same house. She, Ginny, and Luna find themselves in a time both oddly the same and at the same time stunningly different from the time they left from and it doesn't take them long to begin to question whether they want to go back at all.

summaries: The plan was simple. Marry Severus Snape. summaries: Draco credeva che dopo la caduta del Signore Oscuro e l'ignominia di cui si era macchiata la sua famiglia, avrebbe preferito essere corteggiato da un Dissennatore che tornare a Hogwarts, ma non aveva fatto i conti con i piani di quella strega di sua madre.Hermione confidava di lasciarsi alle spalle i tormenti della guerra e delle perdite e avrebbe preferito la sicurezza che erano sempre stati i suoi libri e la prospettiva dei M.A.G.O., se non fosse stato per quella convocazione nell'ufficio della preside McGranitt e la pulce nell'orecchio che le aveva instillato Narcissa Malfoy.Questa è una storia che parla di redenzione e perdono, di legami difficili da recidere, anche se sono stati forgiati nell'odio.Le porte incantate di Hogwarts si sono riaperte per un nuovo anno e non c'è più Harry Potter sulla bocca di tutti... be', non più dei resoconti della Gazzetta del Profeta che segue la sua formazione all'Accademia Auror, almeno.Ora l'attenzione è tutta puntata su una nota Grifondoro e un certo Serpeverde e c'è chi si domanda tra una scommessa e una punizione da quale bacchetta esploderà il primo Schiantesimo.

summaries: “I’m not the prey here.” Hermione whispered as Draco continued to circle her. He stopped, a touch away, so close that he was breathing in the pounding notes of her bleeding heart. She hoped it tasted like poison to him.He leaned in, eyes on her lips. “Aren’t you?” Hermione Granger awakens after the Battle of Hogwarts to find herself in a maze of unidentifiable rooms, each holding a horror more frightening than the last. She thinks she is alone, brought here by Voldemort to be tortured, but soon runs into Draco Malfoy. Their story was supposed to be simple: reluctant allies until they beat the maze and find the exit. But when new players are introduced, Order members and Death Eaters alike, they must decide who they want to become and who they must try to save. Even if that means betraying each other.*takes place immediately after the battle, so books 1-7 stay canon*

summaries: “Will you be a good girl for me?”“Wh-what?” she chose possibly the worst time to stumble over her words but she just couldn’t help herself. Did he really just ask her that?“Is that what gets you off, Granger? Praise?” what on earth made him think he could question her like this! She blushed scarlet and couldn’t meet his eyes. No one had ever asked her questions like that and by the infuriating smirk on his way too handsome face, he seemed to know it.“Tell me, do you know what gets you off?” he asked her, closing in on her body and crowding her against the wall. “Or have you been saving this sweet, Gryffindor pussy for a Slytherin to defile?”Still, she said nothing. She couldn’t have if she tried. And that, apparently, was confirmation enough for Malfoy.ORWhat if Draco Malfoy staked his claim on Granger sixth year? What if Granger discovered his secret and demanded he go to Dumbledore? What if Dumbledore had a way to hide him? How much would Draco Malfoy change if instead falling victim to the Dark Lord...he fell in love? And if, at the greatest crossroads of his life, Draco Malfoy fell in love...well, who would he become then?7th year AU with 6th year flashback throughout.

summaries: Sabe como isso funciona, Sirius. Você sempre me pede para ficar e eu sempre vou embora.Scarlett Gaunt e Sirius Black tem muito mais em comum do que gostariam. Amigos, gostos, músicas. Arrependimentos, mágoas, sombras. A pena em Azkaban. A posição no time de Quadribol. Os dois são fogo e brasa, vapor e rigidez, calor e fervor. E o que eles têm é ardente, coalesce, liquefaz e enrijece. É agonia e expectativa. Atroz e pujante.Entretanto, Sirius Black e Scarlett Gaunt também tem suas diferenças. Grifinória e Sonserina, Ordem da Fênix e Comensal da Morte. Cachorro e gato. Rainbow e Toto. Injustiçado e assassina.Como se já não bastasse, Scarlett vê e conversa com os fantasmas de seus amigos que se foram.Essa é a história da estrela que se encontrou com o escarlate. E eles queimaram e queimaram... até tudo virar cinzas.Era dos Marotos | Primeira Guerra Bruxa | Azkaban | Segunda Guerra BruxaSirius Black x OC
