summaries: Corban Yaxley is the poster child of Pure Blood Supremacy, much like Lucius Malfoy. But never mention that in front of him. He absolutely hated the fact that he shared so many physically attributes with the Malfoy Patriarch, and the fact that Lucius have the only thing Corban ever wanted.But that's beside the point, as the new Head of DMLE he have so many things to do Post-War Britain. The Dark Lord won, Potter is truly dead. And now what? What will happen to Britain? Their government? Economy?And then, there's the huge problem of Pureblood repopulation. The Dark lord had gifted them young wizards and witches as bounties, now what?Corban Yaxley found himself puzzled at how he should treat the peculiar blonde ravenclaw named Luna Lovegood under his name. The whimsy 17yo shine like a bright sun in his drab and gloomy mansion. The child is a living hazard, not only to herself but to him.Because ever since she arrived in his life, he's not even sure of his life's trajectory, anymore.

summaries: Luca Prince wakes from his coma after five years to find out that everything has changed since he'd been asleep. His family is the same as always just older and way more protective of him than before. That's saying something.He finds that the guy he's loved since he was two and had dated for a year has moved on. He had nothing left to cling to, and you know it, he's a very clingy person.He decides to follow one of his childhood dreams and become a writer.It's going to take a lot of work but he will survive this new world around him. Good thing, he's not alone. Warning: This story goes to dark places. It is angst, pain, love, hate, and everything that you could want but the warning is out there. It gets dark.

summaries: When Eileen is forced out of her family home, she has nowhere else to go but to the Muggle who impregnated her. She lives with him, she cooks for him, she raises his child-- but what she doesn't do is marry him. She's still legally a free woman, and when a wizard from her past proposes marriage she takes her chance. There's just one catch: she has to leave her son, Severus, behind.It has been over five years since she's seen her son, and life has been going well for her. She has a daughter now, a little girl in need of a governess. Eileen places an advertisement in the paper, and a Miss Melanie Swann, half-blood, answers. The girl is perfect for the job, but Eileen can't help but feel there is something strangely familiar about her, and ever since Miss Swann arrived on her doorstep her perfect life has been slowly unraveling.

Lost and lonely, he regains his humanity when he meets Kate Mayflower, the Hogwarts assistant librarian. Positive and kind, she helps Sebastian find hope and happiness again as he rebuilds his life. summaries: I think I want to take over Britain. Harry said, smiling into the chilled breeze as the sun set. How about it? He glanced over at Tom, still sitting by his side.We could. Tom replied, But it would be hard.Not if we worked together. Harry said, Grindelwald was alone. You were alone before. This time, we'll be together. Tom examined him closely, his hazel eyes gazing into Harry's green for a long searching moment.Alright. Tom said finally, a smile gracing his face. Let's do it.—Crossroads offers Harry and Tom another chance at life, sending them back to 1988 where they both wake up as 8 years olds. Chaos ensues as they try their best to navigate their second chance.

They will be Lord and Lady Paramount of the Westerlands, with sons and daughters to follow them down the years.There is only one small hitch, in the form of Jaime's bastard daughter Rohanne Lannister. Once the princess he swore to protect with his life, now the rightful Queen of the Seven Kingdoms and the last of a murdered house.Believed dead, she must play her role, and live under the man who had her family butchered or she and her protectors will share the fate of the Targaryens...

summaries: In a post second wizarding war world, Narcissa’s lie has saved Draco and herself from being charged with wizarding crimes, but Lucius is jailed. Despite Narcissa's heroic efforts she and Draco are banned from the wizarding world and are forced into the muggle world. Draco still has one more year of school left and with no other options, enrolls in Muggle High School. Meanwhile Petunia's many secrets have been exposed. She has been attending night school secretly and has just earned her teaching certificate and is about to start her first teaching job. Also, she doesn't love Vernon anymore and wants a divorce. Soon Narcissa and Petunia's worlds collide in the most surprising way and lead to something completely unexpected.

summaries: Looking back, the day Mary MacDonald was attacked by Wulfric Mulciber marked the beginning of the end. Albeit was a slow beginning. Not one that any of the students at Hogwarts would be able to see as the first pull towards the impending war’s disastrous end.It was only with hindsight they could see how the moment was a line being drawn in the sand. That the unity of Hogwarts had failed them. Their petty pranks and jinxes had shifted to assaults and curses. There would be no care between houses, no breaking the divide between them, only nurturing it. Only continuing the hate their parents had harboured because what other choice did they have? It was life and death. It was honour and family.Or fifth year at Hogwarts 1975-76. The aftermath of Mulciber's attack on Mary, Lily determining where her allegiances lie, the prank tm, and a little bit of wholesome falling in love along the way.

summaries: Except for his ancient magic ability, Hufflepuff 5th Year Matthias Hughes is just a normal student at Hogwarts. That is until he and his friends are kidnapped and tormented by Victor Rookwood and his Ashwinders. They all survive, but at what cost? And what is it about Matthias that has Rookwood so obsessed?✦•······················•✦•······················•✦This story follows the plotline of the Hogwarts Legacy game with additional plot centered around the MC Matthias. Keep in mind that this means game spoilers if you have not played. Read the note at the beginning of the story, as there is a lot of whump in this one. Graphic scenes do appear within, but this is overall not a 'porn with plot' story. Matthias's journey will come full circle, and the villains firmly remain villains. No Stockholm Syndrome/changed villains here.

summaries: “This is dangerous?”“You have no idea, do you?” His eyes darkened as he came towards her. “Love, you’re alone with me in my room in the very early morning. You’re marrying me tomorrow so that I don’t have to go back to prison, and you’ve just proposed that I slowly corrupt you by degrees; that I have my way with you; that I teach you all about your body, about what makes you feel good, about how to be with a man; that we do everything but that one thing that would ruin us… and now you want me to kiss you. If that’s not dangerous, kitten, I don’t know what is.”*** *** ***With the passage of the Pureblood Marriages Act, Sirius Black has only weeks to marry a Muggle-born witch or face reimprisonment in Azkaban. Desperate, he has no choice but to turn to the only Muggle-born he knows: Hermione Granger. But there are complications to this fake union that neither of them has ever dreamt of… not the least of which is how much they actually want each other. This is a Marriage Law fic with a definite twist.

summaries: Nine years after the war, and Harry thinks he's fine. All right, his work is all-consuming and his social life is woeful. But while he might be able to downplay the physical aches and pains brought on by chasing criminals, it's impossible to ignore the disturbed nights and visions of the past, much less find someone to share his life with, and it's getting harder to believe that that will ever happen.Draco has spent years trying to establish himself as someone of worth to Wizarding Society, albeit in a reclusive, understated way. Throwing himself into his business in an attempt to manage his own anxieties and ignore the nagging voice telling him that he's not good enough, his private little world is at least safe and comfortable. Or as safe as he can make it.But when famous Harry Potter shows up in his shop after nine years, everything looks set to be turned on its head.

summaries: Even the best laid plans can go awry.The lives of the Potter children have been laid out since the moment that Lily and James went into hiding. Harry is set to be the prophecy child, a walking sacrifice, and Elowen, his staunch supporter, born to be a martyr.But what Albus Dumbledore doesn’t know is that the universe has been forcibly knocked out of balance by Voldemort’s actions, and Lily’s determination to protect her children paired with his meddling has set into motion a prophecy far older than that of the Chosen One.History marches in repetition, after all. The Potter Twins and their friends are all but doomed to repeat it.

summaries: “The first time Tom Riddle met Hadrian Peverell, he was eight years old.It was a cold day in winter, after school had stopped for the holidays that those outside of the orphanage would be celebrating with their families. There were no decorations up in Wool’s Orphanage, though, the inescapable chill in the air the only mark of the season.A police officer brought Hadrian to Wool’s, and after talking with Mrs Cole for a few minutes, left without another word to his young charge.Hadrian, for his part, didn’t seem to be paying attention. He was refusing to make eye contact with anyone and stood, shoulders hunched, in the corner nearest the door, as if hoping to blend in with the peeling wallpaper and old cobwebs.Tom turned away from the boy and strode back up the stairs to his room. What did he care about some messy-haired little kid, anyway? He’d just be another child to fear-hate-hurt him.”

summaries: How is one supposed to act when your friends are picked off one by one? They’re locked up, they leave, they die. Remus can never, will never blame James for that, but it’s difficult when all he wants to do is blame somebody, anybody. And so Remus does what he does best: bottle it up until the bottle breaks.OrRemus and James get into a fight, sending Remus on a collision course... literally. But a dicey apparition, a bar fight, and a near-drowning (in a puddle) later, he finds himself in the care of Madam Pomfrey, who is probably the only person who could fix this situation. After a cup of tea, a good cry, and a much needed talk, Remus might be on the way to healing himself, and his friendship with James--some of the only family he has left.

summaries: “Well Christ, ‘Mione, I’ve been standing outside the pub for ten minutes already. Luna and Nev are gonna be late, something about her earring missing a radish.” Hermione snatched up her keys before taking one last glance around the flat. Turning towards the exit, she furrowed her brow at the redhead’s words and threw her front door open distractedly. “What do you mean she’s missing a radish-”Screeching to a halt, Hermione fumbled the phone, barely able to maintain cradling it against her ear as she almost ran into someone standing on the small landing. Managing to save herself and the person in question from the impending collision, she glanced up only to become absolutely entranced by the clearest set of azure colored eyes she’d ever seen.The woman had turned abruptly upon Hermione’s exit from her flat and was gazing at the flustered brunette with barely concealed amusement in her eyes. They seemed to glitter under the landing’s dim lamplight and Hermione was momentarily stunned by the vision in front of her.Because if Andy and Bella were the night sky, then Hermione was sure Narcissa Black was the moonlight shining from above.

summaries: Everything is in ruin.Everyone is in ruin.Hermione Granger must return to Hogwarts for her final year. She only needs to get through. They all do. However, returning to how things were, isn’t an option. She will lose no more of her time, she’ll do what she likes. She deserves it, doesn’t she?Draco Malfoy wants to run away. He’s returning to Hogwarts with his last mission, to fulfill the Ministry’s required probation and then he’s off the map. He’s going to vanish. It’s his only option. But he won’t leave alone, he’s going to drag along his best friend. Finish the year, and they’ll finally be free, right?Theodore Nott, thinks not. You see he’s made a new friend. And they have plans, to live it up and be teenagers, while they still can.

summaries: Those greyish irises look upon the dusty sky. The nose looks red, and the cheeks too. The lips look dry and chapped; and he breathed out, made hot smokes that slipped away in no time. His thick cardigan inside, and the coat after, also with the knit scarf and the beanie, with dark wine mitten and the long socks and his leather boots, and he can still feel the cold, numb, and hollow that is now seeding, and growing, and blooming into ugly thoughts about his, supposedly, better life since he had runaway from the house.In Regulus' childhood and adolescence, Sirius was the one who became the knight in shining armor, the joy of his life, and the pride of his universe.Now, it is his turn who will be Sirius's knight in shining armor, the joy of his older brother's life, and the pride of this loving man's universe.

You are foolish, and you are exactly what your name says you should be, and I will not play into hands that hold the mark, not even if they're yours! Tell the dark lord he can kiss my-It takes a pledge to be a part of the Ministry, a strong one to be, for all intents and purposes, a government assassin. She did not intend to go down this route, to take this oath to her society, but when England is forced to wear a mask that looks very much like the one of a Death Eater, Hermione has little choice.It takes a pledge to be a part of the Ministry, but it also takes a contract of life to be a part of the Dark Lord's highest ranks. When his father unexpectedly returns from Azkaban with a loyalty to prove and a leader to please, Draco Malfoy finds himself secretly balancing between the moralities of his job and the immoralities of his duty.It certainly did not get any easier when he was appointed to aid the intelligence of a witch and her secret service.

summaries: “I just want to understand, Malfoy. If you talk to me I can help because it’s kind of obvious that you need it, just let me help-”“You can’t help me!” Draco punctuated the sentence by punching his fist into the sink. Or at least attempting to, as his arms were firmly bound to his sides. “There is nothing to help.”“Merlin Malfoy, what do you want from me? What? What can I offer you to get you to talk? I’ll leave you alone, I’ll stop stalking you, I’ll stop insinuating that you’re evil and a death eater even though it is very evident that you are,” Harry gestured to the forearm that Draco was now realizing was exposed. “I’ll make a deal.”Draco resisted another eyeroll. “What, we’ll meet up and I’ll talk about my feelings? And then you can go back to your dorm and think, wow, I, Saint Potter, saved another poor soul today?”“Pretty much, yeah. I won’t tell anyone. It will just be me who knows. And I bet I’m a better confidant than Moaning Myrtle.”...Or instead of casting Sectumsempra on Draco, Harry casts Brachiabindo and forces Draco to meet up with him once a week so he can finally figure out what Draco's been plotting.

summaries: “I think it’s time we talked,” his green eyes bore into my cold grey ones.“Please sit.” I drain all my energy in staying emotionless. My final defense being to feel less, to hurt less, “What is it that you would like to discuss?”“I think it’s time we stop all of this” His fingers run through his dark waves, “I’m tired, I can’t love you anymore. I’m sorry.”“You can’t or you don’t?”“What?” His eyebrows furrowed together as his mouth grimaces.“Well which is it? Can you not love me anymore? Or do you not love me anymore?” I needed to hear him say it. I needed him to mean it._____Harry makes the mistake of listening to others and Draco makes the mistake of not saying enough._____Inspired by Manchester Orchestra’s The Gold–Phoebe Bridgers VersionThis one has a happy ending :)

summaries: At the climax of the first Wizarding War, the followers of Voldemort and, in particular, those unmarried and without heirs, were encouraged by the dark lord to copulate with other pure-blood wizards of high standing so as to ensure the survival of their pure bloodlines in the case of death or imprisonment following the war.Thus, resulted in the birth of Katherine Lucille Ceridwen Lestrange, the sole heir to the Lestrange fortune by blood alone. Conceived through illegitimate means by Lord Rabastan Lestrange and Lady Mallorie Ceridwen on poor Mallorie's 18th birthday after a manipulative seduction on the part of Lord Lestrange.So the sad tale goes that the poor Lady Ceridwen awoke the next day with no sign of the mysterious man, left with nothing from him but the babe within her belly and a letter stating that she would bear the child of Rabastan Lestrange, Death eater and servant to the Dark Lord in 9 months time.Katherine, Bastard heir to House Lestrange attends her 7th year at Hogwarts during the Triwizard Tournament. What will happen as the events of the tournament unfold at the school? Will she fall victim to the darkness dormant in her blood, or find redemption in the arms of one beautiful Veela?

summaries: Standing behind the monster, as this one laughed maniacally and planned the bombing of Gotham’s Children Hospital, the shadow swung his sword. It was a small cut, one that left no DNA or proof that could be linked back to the shadow. No one would ever know the shadow had been involved, or that the Joker had died of anything but natural causes. But death was brought upon the Joker that night, even with a small cut. Because a cut from the All-Sword was all it was needed. No one could come back from it.The Joker was dead.Finally.In one clean cut the shadow ended the nightmare that had plagued Lady Gotham for over a decade.The shadow let out a shaky sigh as he felt it. How the chains weighing him down broke. The last of the green mist leaving his mind. The shadow smiled as he felt Lady Gotham thanking him. But there was no need for any thanks. Tonight, the shadow had freed Gotham. Tonight, the shadow had freed himself.When the shadow opened his eyes, they were back to the beautiful blue they had been before his death. The shadow welcomed the world once more as who he had been.After all, Jason was finally free.

summaries: It’s the summer of 1989, and Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry has hired ten teaching assistants to help the professors in the approaching school year. To prepare the teaching assistants for their busy academic year, they’re invited to Hogwarts for the summer to train with their professors.Rose Wilson, a Hogwarts alumni five years post-grad, is happiest when next to a cauldron, concocting a recipe for a new potion or fine-tuning one of her creations. But being paired with the formidable Professor Severus Snape is tougher than it seems, for reasons Rose could never have foreseen.As the summer warms, so does Severus to Rose, and Rose’s vision of what seemed to be a steppingstone to her future alters and shifts once more. It seems, for once, she won’t be able to brew her way out of this. TW: heavy drinking, recreational drug use, mention of suicide, mention of depression, mentioned/implied death of character, reference to parental neglect and abuse, grief/mourning

summaries: No one knew exactly when Draco Malfoy was inflicted with the curse of vampirism. The Order only knew that after he was turned, he became a weapon. Voldemort’s favorite weapon at that. Before, he was little more than a teen boy, throwing jinxes around on the battlefield. They had all just been teenagers, forced to grow up, forced to fight, forced to kill.After Draco returned, he was lethal. It seemed that no spell, hex, jinx, or curse could stop him. He’d just flick them away like a fly, not even batting an eye. If they did make an impact, he barely flinched. The speed at which he could counter spells seemed impossible. A dozen curses could be cast from him without uttering a word before anyone could slow him down.Killing by magic was not enough for the vampire. Draco Malfoy would rip the throats from those he encountered, sinking his fangs deep into their flesh, tearing away at them. They would be forced to bury bodies drained completely of blood and gutted like animals. By the end of a battle, he had killed more with his own hands than he did with a wand. Monster.

summaries: All Lily has ever wanted is to be a knight, like her father, Sir Lionel. After Camelot is attacked and the magical sword Excalibur is stolen, she finds herself teaming up with James, a young blind hermit, as they embark on a quest to find the lost sword. Together, they face the threat of the evil Ruber, navigate challenges with a two-headed dragon and an ogre, and discover that they're more alike than they initially thought. Will they manage to return the sword to Arthur in time, or will they lose not only each other but also their dreams and the precious Excalibur?Based on the 1998 movie Quest for Camelot, but more plot and less singing.

summaries: Olympians Overseas is a fan-made crossover book featuring characters from the critically acclaimed Percy Jackson series- written by Rick Riordan, and Harry Potter. Percy Jackson and Annabeth Chase have saved the world twice now, and are ready for the dangerous quest of attending university for the first time. But when a certain centaur has an unofficial mission sanctioned by the goddess of magic, plans for a further education are thrown on their head. Skipping straight past degrees and shoved into the position of magical professors undercover at a magical school nearly halfway across the world, the dynamic and unstoppable couple must try to keep a young boy's story from derailing, keeping him and his world as safe as possible. And if they can't, who says the world of demigods will be safe either?

summaries: Adhara Black is used to being overwhelmingly ordinary and a bit of an outcast even at a young age. With an overprotective mom as her only friend she can’t see beyond her solitude. Magic has other plans and forces the hand that should have been teaching her. Secrets are revealed; lies that were left to sink come to surface, and any semblance of an ordinary life fades to the past. Now she must carry a fractured family on her shoulders and a mom who needs piecing together. She’ll do what ever it takes to raise her family from the ashes; even if she has to become the villain in someone else’s story.Under her leadership they’ll all remember why they feared House Black. -slight timeline change

summaries: Hermione Granger had known she was adopted since she was a small child. Now, the witch thing, that had been a surprise. Strange things had been happening around her for years, but an entire world hiding away from the one she’d lived in her whole life. One thing she is not going to do, is complain about a whole world of knowledge being opened up to her (and, maybe, a chance to fit in with children her own age now her ‘outbursts’ would be normal).She did wonder if this meant that one or both of her birth parents were magical, whether she would finally get answers about why they gave her up. It’ll have to wait of course, because no matter how small the magical community is there’s no way she’ll run into either of them in school! Right?

summaries: All of the old families had their roles back in the day, the things they would do to help protect their culture, their people, and their magic.Over time, many of them forgot their oaths. Oaths to protect all those who held magic, to protect them from the muggles who wished to stamp them out, and chose to become the ones that instead tried to stamp out the ones who were born from the muggles instead.But the Potters never forgot.The Potters were Protectors, who wrapped those who needed a safe home up in their arms and took them in, declaring them as members of the family, as part of their blood, so they could never be harmed again. They didn't care where someone came from, who they were before, what they'd done. If they wanted a fresh start, they were offered one.However, that kindness only extends so far, and it always stops the second a member of the family is killed.So when Charlus and Dorea Black-Potter are alerted to the deaths of their nephew and his wife, they already know what to do. The instincts are in their blood, in their very magic.Protect their family, at all costs.Even if it means disappearing from the wizarding world altogether.

summaries: Charlie wasn't sure how she was going to make the hotel work and save her people from Extermination, but then her Aunt Calliope comes back to Hell and turns everything they all thought they knew upside down.Angels can be killed, Exterminated Sinners get reborn somewhere else, and the Peverell Name is more than just a myth, who knew?And a certain Radio Demon in particular is keeping a very close eye on the situation - with all the chaos that happens around Calliope Liliana Peverell on an hourly basis alone, things are set to be highly entertaining. Found a video on YouTube called 'Charlie goes to Court' and watched it on my lunch break. Now I'm hooked on Hazbin Hotel.PS. I own nothing, all rights go to original creators. I also have no particular opinions about religion, so don't criticize my take on the concept of a show that's literally about the afterlife, please.Edit: Adding in a bit of Helluva Boss after finding the gem that is Fizzarolli's song 'Two Minute Notice' and thinking he and Angel Dust would be fantastic friends.

summaries: After breaking up with her boyfriend, 15 year old Kitty Pryde found herself pregnant. She faced the heartbreaking decision to give her young son up for adoption. A little over a year later, she heard the family was attacked by terrorists and that no one was left alive. She cried. She mourned. She sought revenge. She rebuilt her life. Now, thirteen years later, she has found her son alive. Harry was always told that he was a freak, and the summer after his third year seemed to prove it as he turned to steel and broke his cousin's hand. Now he's found out he has a living mother, a mutant heritage, and a whole world of questions.With the help of friends both new and old, two heroes learn how to be mother and son. But with manipulative old men and evil masterminds always about, can even a simple goal be free of peril?

summaries: “Am I in trouble?”McGonagall looked down at Enid through her glasses. “That remains to be seen. I would like you to know that I make a point of memorizing each student's name the moment they walk into Hogwarts for the first time. Tell me then, why is it that I do not know your name, nor can recall ever having you in one of my classes?”Enid looked down, unable to hold her gaze. “Could you get Harry, please? It would be so much easier to explain with him here.”“Mr. Potter will not be visiting you until I have deemed it safe. I do not believe that you are a member of this school, and given the recent attack, I think my hesitancy to have you arrested until I have heard from you is kind enough. Now, I will ask one more time. Who are you, and why are you here?”Enid looked up. “My name is Enid Sinclair and I’m from another dimension.”

summaries: Harry nunca esperó una conversación sobre devolver la varita de Draco.Nunca te odié. Estaba jodidamente celoso, ¿vale? Y me llevó todo eso darme cuenta de que no tengo ni idea de cómo querer a alguien. Y tal vez pasé años gustándote de manera equivocada, pero no importa porque soy yo. No importa porque tú seguirás con tu vida y nunca tendrás que verme de nuevo y podrás tener cuarenta malditos hijos pelirrojos y tal vez un día, años después, finalmente te habré olvidado y olvidaremos que esto alguna vez sucedió. Gracias por salvar el mundo, lo siento por ser un idiota, que tengas una buena vida.Harry no puede lidiar, especialmente cuando su grupo de compañeros es enviado de vuelta a Hogwarts para terminar su Séptimo Año interrumpido. Y Draco Malfoy no está en absoluto preparado para enfrentarse al amor de su vida todos los malditos días ahora que lo sabe.ODraco ha estado enamorado de Harry todo este tiempo, finalmente confiesa, y luego sigue la proximidad forzada. summaries: Pressure from several departments within the Ministry of Magic has made some...radical changes to the ancient rules of the Triwizard Tournament in the name of diversifying the challenges. The tournament has extended to include other magical beings, outsiders from a camp in America that nobody at Hogwarts has even heard of.James Potter thought he had enough to deal with this year. He's supposed to be focused on running Quidditch tryouts, planning pranks with his best friends, and most of all - keeping his dark, uncomfortable little secret from one best friend in particular. What he didn't account for is a group of demigods coming in and mucking everything up for him.Percy Jackson is tired of saving the world. And that's just in the United States. He never imagined that he would suddenly be brought to Scotland, forced to stay in a castle with a bunch of strangers wielding sticks and speaking nonsensical, and apparently magic, words at each other.The year brings about twists and turns that neither wizard nor demigod ever anticipated - leading to unlikely bonds that neither party ever saw coming.

summaries: Riley Peverell had an eventful year when she joined Hogwarts as a fifth-year. But it's nothing compared to what awaits her now, and the decision to return is being tested on more than one occasion. If it weren't for her cousin Ominis, she would jump on her Graphorn and ride all the way back to Durmsgtrang. But funnily enough, Durmstrang is coming to her.Her old friends are with her at Hogwarts as Triwizard Tournament takes place, including the person who was almost her boyfriend back then. And when he is declared the Durmstrang's Champion, Sebastian feels threatened. And to top it off, Anne is back and she is not that sweet girl Riley remembers from Feldcroft.Trying her best to prove to Professor Hecat she is ready to be Unspeakable and follow in her footsteps, it is Professor Sharp who takes her under his wings, making Riley question more than one of her decisions made in her fifth year. And when the rumours start to circulate about their endeavours, more than a reputation is on the line.

summaries: “The young Malfoy heir. A pleasure to see you again. Though you most likely do not remember me; I am Lord Voldemort.”Those words still haunt me in my sleep. The way his red eyes gleamed in excitement when I walked through the Manor doors after fourth year ended. Waiting to appoint my mission to his, our, cause as Father's puts it. All I need to do is to get close to Potter in order for this blasted bond to form. Then, my mission will be complete and Mother can relax. She can sit by the fire with a cup of tea instead of freezing up every time the Dark Lord would Crucio me for his 'experiments'.Just need to get close to Potter and complete the mission. That's what all he is, just a mission regardless of the odd feelings I get around him.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Update 2-27-2024: Due to recent developments in the fanfic community, I am posting this here. summaries: Are you saying all this time, it's been possible? That we could have…  No, we couldn't have. James' rough fingers came up to Regulus' face, forcing him to stare into the hazel eyes, Are you lying right now? No. Then tell me to stop, and I will. ... ... After a decade of grief and lashing out about Remus' death, Sirius hears whispers of potential survivors. Together, Sirius and James embark on a perilous journey to find Remus in the zombie-infested world, only to discover he is not who he used to be... Now, it is down to Regulus to save them from the wastelands. And he would have succeeded too, if he hadn't been bitten. With only 2 days left to live, Regulus doesn't have the luxury of pretending he doesn't want James anymore, when he had wanted him desperately for more than a decade.... ... Zombie Apocalypse AU: Sirius devotes everything to find Remus, while Regulus' imminent death pushes his unspoken feelings for James to the surface, forcing him to love like there is no tomorrow; because there isn't. The trio must navigate through physical dangers and emotional turmoil that accompany the search for lost loved ones.

summaries: It’s so clear, you see, that if we’re to begin living in the present, we must first redeem our past and then be done with it forever. And the only way we can redeem our past is by suffering and by giving ourselves over to extraordinary labor, to steadfast and endless labor.    Anton Chekhov, The Cherry Orchard  Set long after the Battle of Hogwarts.Draco Malfoy is abruptly and unwillingly called home after spending the last twenty years living and studying abroad. It seems that there are things at Malfoy Manor which need to be put to rest, and the Ministry of Magic has determined that as the sole remaining Malfoy by blood, Draco is the only one who can do it.But curse breaking is not Draco’s area of expertise, and so the Ministry has found someone willing to help.Weekly updates (fingers crossed).  I don’t own any characters you recognize, I just like to push their faces together and make kissy noises. Not making any money from this, etc., etc. Please do not repost.

summaries: As white as frost, she wore a shawl. Knitted timely and precisely.Veronica Ward is an outcast inside her own house, Slytherin. What she lacks in title, wealth, or fame is replaced by her moral obligation to secrecy. She is the last of her kind and must hide her family secrets and their connection to mermaids in a world that does not accept half-breeds. A shawl she wears around her shoulders keeps her scales and tail hidden, yet new secrets arise among the new term at Hogwarts. A murderer on the loose, new friendships that make her question herself, and the constant strain of her mermaid powers growing stronger—Questions about her mother’s past become unearthed in the chaos of school life, and she must face the relentless crashing of waves from the past and her ever-growing reality. She must choose to be a Slytherin, a mermaid, a half-breed, or drown in the constant reminder that she will never be human. @CicadapieA Harry Potter Fanfiction.All OC characters belong to me, and everyone else is canon characters from the books/movies.

summaries: “Harry!” He looked back to see his mentor’s face, pale underneath the streaks of blood and ash that covered it. His golden eyes were wide as they locked on Harry, seeming almost nervous.    “There’s no time!” Draco called out, grabbing his hand and pulling Harry towards the massive turner that would take them (hopefully) back twenty years into the past.    “Forgive us!” Remus called, raising his voice now over the building hum of the time turner, carrying a note of desperation. “He always meant to tell you. But then he was gone and it didn’t seem my place.”    “What–” Harry began, but then the power of the turner coursed through him, through his arm where Draco held him and he felt himself get dragged backwards into the vortex. The last thing he saw before his world went dark was the pleading in Remus’ eyes.    “Forgive us.”   Or: Harry and Draco travel back in time to defeat Voldemort and find that nearly everything they knew about the past (and present) is built on lies.

summaries: “Do you really believe in all that? The universe making things how they are?”“Of course I do. Who else could ever learn to understand my ways if not for a soulmate? The universe must craft people perfectly for one another. It’s written in the stars. I know it, deep down. Don’t you?”Alice’s head tips down to look at her string, practicing buzzing from how close their hands lay. Almost touching but not quite. The string illuminates their small space between bookshelves a low and warm golden glow she doesn’t think she’s ever known before. How can Narcissa not see it? It’s right there—for all to see. How can something be so obvious to Alice when someone right next to her cannot see it for the life of her? So close. If Narcissa could see, it would change everything. But who is Alice to wish for such a selfish thing? Maybe… maybe Alice would be alright with it if Narcissa knew how beautiful the glow was. The string now seems like it’s mocking her, displaying itself so clearly knowing she is the only one able to see. To know.“Yeah, I guess I do.”

I am the worst possible choice–”“You are the only choice,” she interrupted. “I don’t mean to be harsh, Remus, truly, but you are. James and Lily–”“James and Lily would not have wanted their son raised by a monster.”

summaries: After the Battle of Hogwarts, things for Harry Potter should have gotten better. Some how they have gotten worse. The nightmares haven't changed, just more vivid with more faces. He couldn't stand social interaction and touching. He just couldn't stand his thoughts or the crushing guilt that was all but drowning him. He has a house he doesn't want, no job or career and is completely at lost to what to do with his life.Draco Malfoy is currently in hell. That is all he can think of. Muggle Hell. His life is currently falling apart and not just because his entire family has been sentenced to live like Muggles. He didn't know what he had been thinking when he had thrown Harry his wand. He had been stupid. All he could hear was Pansy screaming at him, his mother's terrified look and his father's disgusted one. He couldn't sleep at night and the guilt of such a stupid decision ate at him. He had thrown away his future, his friends, his education, all for what? On a gamble that stupid saint potter would be the end of it all, finally?They both were completely surprised when they recieved a letter from Hogwarts at the end of summer inviting them to redo their final year and graduate.

summaries: There was nothing to see in an Azkaban cell except the sky through his tiny window. From the moment he could, Sirius Orion Black had spurned nearly every lesson his family had ever forced down his throat, but somethings had lingered. His French was still nearly as fluent as his English. He’d never had to study for an ancient runes exam. And Sirius knew the night sky like some people knew their hometowns. The stars remind him he needs to go home whether he feels worthy of it or not.Remus Lupin is tied to the moon and the night deep in his blood in ways he hates, fears and cannot escape. Only one person had ever truly understood, and now it was possible that Remus had never really known him at all. It had all been a lie. The wolf and the moon seem to disagree.a wolfstar almost fix-it about using the stars to find your way home

summaries: Ages ago, a wizard known as Herpo the Foul defied Death and doomed the world and those who were yet to be born. His ambition was put to and end, yet briefly, for the events of the past are bound to happen again as the ages come and ago. It is in the present age, as Voldemort's reign of terror is deemed as over, that the Wizarding Wolrd would understand the story had yet to finish.This will be a Ron-centric fic that starts before the events of the first book. It will have many points of view, both from Rowling's characters and some original ones from mine. There won't be any unnecessary bashing or perfect characters; this is a realistic story in which everyone has flaws and virtues. It will cover the seven years of the original saga, following the canon plotline as my original plots intertwine with it. This is a story with heavy world-building and magical lore.

summaries: In her final year at Koldovstoretz, Isabella Flames, a Slytherin student, gets the chance to participate in an exchange program at Hogwarts. There, besides her studies as a 7th-year student, she'll be a professor assistant. Little does she know once with this chance, her life is going to change. And the only thing which will save her is a love she never expected: Bellatrix Black, who is now the DADA teacher at Hogwarts.Now, Bellatrix Black, who once was one of the most infamous Death Eaters, changed sides during the war, contributing to the salvation of the Wizarding World. But things get harder and harder for her, not only because she can't forgive herself for all the people who lost their lives during the atrocities of the Battle of Hogwarts, but she also falls in love with the only person who'll never stop trying to show her how much light she has in herself. Her new assistant, Isabella.It’s like flowers are growing up inside of you and you simply won’t let them out.The fandom is part of the Harry Potter world, created by J. K. Rowling. Some of the characters are originals, when some of the others are created by J. K. Rowling herself.

summaries: -WOLFSTAR-Home? That word had not been heard for a long time. . . or at least not before they met.Set in a desolate post-apocalyptic landscape, Sirius is among a group searching for shelter from the devastation caused by a malevolent pathogen. The bleak beauty of a transformed world, where hope intertwines with desolation and determination defies fate. The destiny of Sirius and his group is uncertain as they face the challenges of a world that has changed forever.  The world had turned them into compost; it wanted to get rid of them and just make them disappear.

summaries: Crossposted, unsurprisingly. Feedback is much appreciated, as long as it's constructive.Most of these will involve Marvel/the MCU, DC, Harry Potter, Star Wars, Star Trek, or Buffy the Vampire Slayer. I'm a sucker for canon divergence, both reading and creating, especially when the train actually goes off the rails; it can be easy to get into the habit of 'this is how X event would have looked with the changes I introduced earlier' even when those changes really mean that X event shouldn't have happened at all, and the story ends up being a rehash of canon with a couple of extra flairs rather than an exploration of the core idea. Self-insertion can make that very easy, along with Peggy Sues. In the same vein, introducing a character or group from one setting into another almost always creates an outside-context problem with potentially fascinating results, and many abilities can do the same when transplanted into a new or existing character.

summaries: In the summer of 1899, Gellert and Albus make a blood pact so that neither can move against the other. But most unluckily, Albus' father, Percival Dumbledore, finds out and does not approve of Albus with a man. He erases the memories of that summer, but Albus is left with the pact. He has one memory left, when he and Gellert made it together. When Albus and Gellert grow to be adults, Gellert searches for him for years, and eventually gets so drunk with power that he runs for the next Minister of Magic. Will they be able to find each other again?

summaries: “You know you can talk to me, right? About anything.” Sirius looked so soft, so beautiful. Even as Remus pushed him away, he looked open, vulnerable. It was a privilege for Remus to see Sirius like this, but he couldn’t appreciate it when all he wanted was to feel that long dark hair running through his fingers. He needed to know what Sirius felt like under his body, what he sounded like as Remus bit and licked and sucked marks into his throat where anyone and everyone could see who he belonged to. Not yours, Remus. Sirius doesn’t belong to you. He didn’t deserve the privilege of Sirius’ vulnerability. .Remus starts to notice a shift in his two best friends. When James and Sirius officially announce their relationship, Remus is far less than thrilled about it; Regulus shares his sentiments. They hatch a plan to break up this budding relationship while Remus struggles to control the wolf inside that is scratching to get to the surface and take what's his. Regulus is doing this purely out of selfless concern for his brother, of course. No other reason.

It’s the first day of summer break for Harry after his third year and Sirius has brought him home to a house he recently bought in an English town. Everything is perfect now, right? Well, not exactly. Harry’s life is hard enough as it is, but now, now that he’s safe, the truth of his identity is unraveling. And his true self might not actually be a ‘he’.

Never for that long.------------In an alternate universe where Voldemort has defeated the Order, Muggle-borns are assigned to a lifetime of servitude to Pureblood families while blood traitors are sent to re-education facilities to be brought to the light. summaries: Margot Riddle's magic is powerful. When she returns to Hogwarts for her 6th year she knows something within her has changed. All she wants is to go to parties with her best friends, cram for exams, and listen to her impressive vinyl collection. She never imagined that she would have to be a part of the largest Wizarding War to date but when she is reconnected with her estranged father, her whole life changes. When she confides in Draco Malfoy she finds that her oldest friend is more important than she realized.A story of betrayal, finding yourself, and, ultimately, the power of loving and being loved in return.A slow-burn romance that is WORTH the wait in gold - promise ;) (#smut)I have the entire first book written so stay tuned!This story covers years 6,7, and beyond with flashbacks starting in year 1.

summaries: Originalmente escrita pela perspectiva de Remo, que logo se tornou a obra de fã mais acessada sobre o Mundo Bruxo, essa é a narrativa de All the Young Dudes pela perspectiva de Sirius. É uma longa história sobre os Marotos, sobre suas vidas, suas dores e seus amores. São mais de 25 anos de história cobertos em 188 capítulos. Uma jornada repleta de emoção que faz você se apaixonar mais a cada página.Embora eu encoraja muito a leitura do ATYD original, isso não é completamente necessário para a compreensão da obra atual. É totalmente possível somente a leitura pela perspectiva do Sirius ou a leitura reversa.Mas, caso queiram, leiam a obra ATYD pela perspectiva de Remo aquiNotas da Tradução:*Decidi manter os nomes dos personagens, disciplinas, feitiços, animais e casas como na edição brasileira dos livros de Harry Potter publicados pela Editora Rocco e traduzidos por Lia Wyler, com raras exceções explicadas nas notas de rodapé.*Quaisquer erros de escrita ou outros equívocos que tenham passado despercebidos à minha revisão, peço a gentileza que deixem nos comentários para correção.

summaries: On their sixteenth birthday two words will appear on every witches's and wizards's skin. These words help them discover their soulmate's identity. But what if destiny has a wicked sense of humor?James thought it would be easy because he just has to make his soulmate smile at him. But what if they just don't?Sirius thought at first it was fun that he has to kiss his soulmate to find them. But now that he has kissed half the school, he is frustrated.Peter hates that his words say: First fuck. How is he ever going to find his soulmate like that?Remus hates that it took just one look of his soulmate for him to know. How can he ever tell Sirius that it is him?Regulus can't bear other people's touch. But in order to find his soulmate, he has to touch them.Evan just has to make his soulmate laugh. But how do you make people laugh if half the school is scared of you?Barty doesn't give a fuck about destiny and he doesn't care that he got the weirdest clue of all: First punch. Why the fuck would his soulmate punch him?

summaries: He ended the little show of power and creativity by tapping his cane on the ground. The cotton candy clouds stopped raining marshmallows and the chocolate trees stopped growing. He grabbed his hat and made a little bow. The applause followed soon after.Everyone, it is a great honour to introduce to you the genius Mr. Willy Wonka. The man behind all of Wonka's chocolate, Dumbledore introduced him to the Great Hall. He is here as a very special guest. Invited to help us with the Triwizard Tournament! Thank you for coming, Mr Wonka.The pleasure is all mine! lied Remus Lupin. Thirteen years ago, Remus Lupin lost everything he held dear. In response he disappeared. Once he resurfaced Remus Lupin didn't exist anymore. Instead, he became the mysterious chocolatier; Willy Wonka. It started with a little shop, it ended with a whole Wonka empire.Then one day Dumbledore showed up. Asking if he, Mr. Wonka, wanted to design the second trial for the Triwizard Tournament. Remus was about to throw the old man out but Dumbledore had a last ace up his sleeve, a reason to return despite the pain it would surely bring.Harry Potter.

summaries: James glanced back over his shoulder. The dull throb of music still emanated from the gym. Glumly he wondered if Lily had noticed he was missing by now. Certainly Sirius, Remus, and Peter would be looking for him.“James,” Regulus’s eyes gleamed wicked silver in the moonlight, “get in.”Or:James Potter has it all figured out: captain of the swim team, amazing friends, and (if he plays his cards right) the girlfriend of his dreams. But when Lily ditches him at prom, James finds himself in the company of the last person he'd ever expect. As summer settles over their small coastal town he discovers just how quickly Regulus Black can unravel the threads of his perfect life.It's Taylor Swift's folklore love triangle but starring Jegulus (with a happy ending).

summaries: Harry James Potter didn’t even know he was a wizard, let alone that he came from a family of magical dragon hybrids called dragels. He certainly didn’t know that his heritage had been sealed away from him, blocked along with nearly everything else that would make him a happy, healthy, and very special boy. So, when he learned that his freakishness was actually magic and there was an entire hidden world for people like him, he didn’t wonder why it was harder for him to do things – he honestly thought that magic was hard for everyone.At the end of his first year, fighting for his life, something shatters deep inside of him.At the end of his second year, once again on the edge of death, something is damaged irreparably, and a change begins that cannot be reversed, only temporarily delayed.He was not prepared for an early dragel inheritance on the day of his 13th birthday.Really, he’d thought it was just magical puberty or a summer flu!HARRY/MULTI CREATURE FIC. Tags will be updated as we go.[Eventual fusion with/featuring original characters and concepts from There Be Dragons, Harry by Scioneeris but it is NOT required reading to enjoy!]

summaries: He had always had these reoccurring dreams, - dreams of another's life, and death - but they were nothing more than that. Just dreams.That all flips on its head, as he enters Hogwarts.His eyes widen and his heart drops into the pit of his stomach. His grey eyes meeting those same striking green eyes, he’s seen too many times to count. The damned eyes that have haunted his nightmares. Warm curls mingling with crimson.••••She had always had dreams of a dark house filled with disturbing silence, a cave and a young mans demise. All with an inherently magical twist to them. So when her sister was discovered to be a witch, she was less surprised and more disturbed by the reality, that what she’d seen so many times in her sleep - might actually be real.When she meets a boy who looks strikingly similar, a nagging feeling settles in her chest as she wonders ‘is that his fate?’Perhaps she’s a little too meddlesome for her own good - but she can’t just leave him, to flow down the stream of horrors she’d witnessed. The question is; will an unlikely friendship bloom, and will this change their fates?

summaries: He glanced around the Potions lab and his eyes caught on Granger. The interior was gloomy, as always. Dimly lit in a way that sometimes made it impossible to make out the words in their textbooks. The room severely lacked any charm, but did have this absurdly curved window that allowed some natural light to peek into the dungeon. It was that moment that she moved her body just so and the light from the window reflected off the myriad of ingredient bottles and onto her. Every freckle, every small insignificant detail of her face, was now lit with hundreds of refracted colors.She comes in colors everywhere.Draco quickly looked back at his work table, silently tapping the beat to the Rolling Stones cover he had discovered that summer.He needed a way in with her. She was unfathomable to him at this point.ORHermione, Draco, and Pansy must learn to navigate the last six months of their Eighth year at Hogwarts. How will their varying personalities cope when faced with frustrating faculty, shifting allegiances, past demons, first loves, first times, self-discovery and eventually (hopefully) self-acceptance?Inspired by and adapted from 10 Things I Hate About You.

summaries: La storia partecipa alla challenge 'Cinque fette di torta alla melassa' indetta sul gruppo Facebook 'L'angolo di Madama Rosmerta' e si tratta una minilong di 5 capitoli su prompt dati dalle parole di una strofa di canzone (tutto indicato nel primo capitolo).Neville sta affrontando l'ultimo anno a Hogwarts, mentre Piton e i Carrow seminano panico e punizioni. Come si fa a resistere a tutto questo? Come si può andare avanti e continuare a credere in qualcosa di buono? A volte basta avere accanto la persona giusta.Non una delle mie migliori storie, ma ho sempre voluto scrivere su questa coppia e ho pensato di approfittare dell'iniziativa.

summaries: It started like this:When Harry was tied to a gravestone, terrified and in pain, Pettigrew took his blood.It started like this:When Voldemort stepped out of the cauldron in all his glory, menacing and out for blood, and reached out a hand to stroke Harry's forehead, Harry realised he didn't feel any pain at all. That, somehow, there was a buzzing in its place that could become pleasure if the situation called for it. Of course, neither of them realised the significance, except that Voldemort could touch Harry in the first place, that his mother's protection was well and truly gone.It started like this:When Voldemort fired off a curse at Harry, it didn't connect at all. When Harry fired off an Expelliarmus, the spellfire didn't meet in the middle at all. In fact, nothing happened, until all there was left was a lingering, incredulous silence, Harry and Voldemort staring at each other in disbelief, the graveyard silent as if the Death Eaters, too, were holding their breaths.

summaries: Long fanfic based on MsKingBean89's ATYD fanfiction of Harry Potter, and partially on Rollercoasterwords' ATYD Sirius' Perspective. (If you haven't read either, read them!!) It's an ATYD fanfic first! This charts the Valkyrie's(mainly Lily, Mary, and Marlene) time at Hogwarts (and beyond) from Lily's PoV. Basically me just rewriting it because I find Lily such an interesting character that I think could be explored more. I'll be making a second one after this from James' perspective because I love pain!1971-1981Read original here: https://archiveofourown.org/works/10057010/chapters/22409387Read Sirius' Perspective here: https://archiveofourown.org/series/2796181This is a Jily fanfic mainly, and is a big buildup to their eventual marriage and love story. Occasional diversion from main love interest(NOT SNAPE). Lily's story and the girls' story takes precedence.Contains a tad of queerness(cause who wasn't in the seventies?).Please don't copy to wattpad.Spotify Playlist:https://open.spotify.com/playlist/39gKKTecSLPY1Ua3YPtyjQ?si=63d706090b3b496eDisclaimer: I am not a supporter of JK Rowling's many disgusting views.

summaries: The wizard formerly known as Harry James Potter could have been a mage of legendary tales—fantasized, fabled, and prophesied. He might have been celebrated for great feats of wandless magic under duress. Once, the young man could have found himself several yards away and, coincidentally, on the roof of his school while attempting to escape certain pain and broken bones—again.Even earlier, faced with another adult willfully ignorant of blatant signs of abuse, his natural skills of transfiguration could have been easily tapped into, turning the woman’s hair a shocking blue. Thus, it is without much surprise that we find ourselves here, on the precipice of highly improbable, though not impossible, magic. Yet, no one shall ever know, for there will never come to be a wizard named Harry James Potter.However, some may be acquainted with Henry Iefan Peverell—an unexpected transfer student who joined the 1974 class of 5th-year students. ***Updates Sunday Evenings***

summaries: Rita Skeeter watched the halls of the Ministry of Magic with cunning eyes, her small Animagus form, a beetle, allowing her to go unnoticed among the busy staff. At fifteen, she was already a master of intrigue and manipulation, skills she learned from watching her mother, a simple cleaning lady at the Ministry.As she slipped into the dark corners, Rita heard murmurs and conversations among the influential wizards who passed by her. She absorbed every word, every secret that fell from his lips. But she knew that secrets alone would not be enough to achieve her ultimate goal: to destabilize the wizarding government and create a power vacuum that she could fill. But to do so, she needed more than secrets; she needed a surname that would guarantee her place in the highest circles of the Ministry.It was then that she remembered Sirius Black, the heir and white sheep of the Black house and the missing piece in her plan. He had grown apart from his friends during his penultimate year at Hogwarts, leaving a gap that Rita was determined to fill. She could link her name to his and instantly gain an extra dose of credibility and influence.The game was just beginning.

summaries: “In my humble opinion there’s only three things that men should be and that is bloody, slutty, and pathetic.” And, on a good day, Draco Malfoy can be all three.When war heroine Hermione Granger and Azkaban-tattooed war criminal Draco Malfoy are forced to wed as part of Shacklebolt’s controversial Reconciliation Act, they openly fight the match and each other—their public brawls breathlessly reported by the press.Secretly, a deeply traumatized Draco delights in Hermione’s attention and pines for a real marriage with her—even as her forced proximity to the Black family magic irritates the cursed scar Bellatrix left on her arm, reminding her why she can never truly trust or forgive him. Then Hermione discovers that Draco’s blood will soothe the scar . . . and Draco is willing to trade his blood for her body.(With post-war blood purity politics, black market potioneers, Pansy Parkinson’s career advice, the Malfoys blackmailing Hermione’s Wizengamot opposition, BDE Neville Longbottom hunting Death Eaters, a slutty Theo Nott serving as Draco’s right-hand man, and Crookshanks loose in Malfoy Manor.)

summaries: Ominis vient d'avoir 12 ans. Il est le dernier né d'une des plus anciennes familles de sorciers et s'apprête à entrer dans la plus prestigieuse école de sorcellerie : Poudlard. Pour le jeune garçon, la nouvelle est aussi inattendue que terrifiante, car elle signifie qu'il devra porter sur ses frêles épaules la réputation de sa famille ancestrale. Comment peut-il faire la fierté d'une famille aussi crainte et respectée que la sienne, alors qu'elle n'exprime que de l'aversion à son égard ? Ominis est aveugle, et il est bien loin d'imaginer qu'il a le pouvoir de sauver le monde des sorciers d'un terrible complot, au prix de douloureux secrets.

summaries: It's ten years after the war, and Harry is treading water. He's been demoted to desk duty at the Auror Office. He hardly ever leaves Grimmauld Place. He's avoiding Ron and Hermione, and he's been drinking—a lot.But when he has a chance encounter with Draco Malfoy in the back alley of his favorite club, his life is turned upside down. Stripped of his wand and on strict parole after a stint in Azkaban, Draco has been keeping a low profile in Muggle London. His pointy nose, haughty sneer, and razor sharp wit are the same. But his wariness, vulnerability, and melancholy are all new—not to mention the ring on his bottom lip. Harry finds himself rapidly becoming obsessed with Draco Malfoy—again.When Kingsley appoints Harry as Draco's new parole officer, Harry must investigate a dangerous figure from Draco's past while grappling with the reality that he's falling in love with Draco. Harry must come to terms with his sexuality, a lifetime of repressed trauma, and the realization that the Ministry is not what he thought it was, all while finding a way to protect Draco and their burgeoning relationship.

summaries: Ominis has just turned 12. He is the youngest child of one of the oldest wizarding families and is expecting to enter the most prestigious School of Witchcraft and Wizardry: Hogwarts. For the young boy, the news is as unexpected as it is terrifying, for it means that his frail shoulders will have to bear the reputation of his ancestral family. How can he makes a family as feared and respected as his own proud, when it expresses nothing but dislike to him? Ominis is blind, and he is far from imagining that he has the power to save the Wizarding World from a terrible plot, at the cost of painful secrets.

summaries: Voldemort no había sido capaz de matarla incontables veces, sus tíos que habían intentado de forma pasiva y activa de deshacerse de ella tampoco, el cerberus, el basilisco, las acromántulas, el dragón, los inferis, Nagini… Nada había sido capaz. La había matado una simple escalera de mármol. Al contrario de lo que hubiera especulado, no se encontró con nadie al otro lado del místico velo donde todos los mortales vivos, no sabía por qué, pensaban que les aguardaba alguien una vez muertos.Revivir en una nueva dimensión, después de todo lo que había experimentado en sus 120 años de vida como bruja, no le sorprendió demasiado. Darse cuenta de que tenía un hermano mellizo y que se encontraba en una aldea ninja era algo muy diferente. Por suerte, estaba curada de espantos. Lo único que podía hacer era vivir su nueva vida, cuidar de su hermano y arrasar como ninja de la Aldea Oculta de la Hoja.Después de todo, ¿quién era ella para decirle que no a esa nueva oportunidad del destino?

summaries: The Department of Magical Education has twisted Albus Dumbledore's arm and have required the Headmaster to get a second teacher for each core subjects at Hogwarts. Severus Snape almost weeps with relief at the news.But the school year is not without other far interesting events.With young Harry Potter starting his first year at Hogwarts, new (surprisingly competent) teachers, a suspicious Albus, and a rare and powerful artifact hidden inside the school, Severus wonders if he ends up trading less homework for even more stresses in his life. Or, this author finds that having 7 teachers for each 7 core subjects for all 7 years for all 4 houses is, frankly, insane, and is here to remedy that.

summaries: I pulled this out of Hogwarts - Help Wanted because, due to the way drafts are saved on A03, it was listing this chapter as having been updated on Nov. 22 2023! Although it was added as a draft then, I only updated and finished it yesterday, March 9, 2024. And I thought it deserved to receive its due. To read any of the other preceding chapters, please see Hogwarts - Help Wanted.  Here's yet another subject J.K. forgot to include in Hogwarts' curriculum. I mean these kids go from scrawny little 11 year olds to full grown, physically mature legal adults, if they stay for their NEWT year. It's a bumpy road in between so somebody's gotta clue them in on what's going on with their bodies. The question is WHO?  Note: THIS chapter contains some suggestive conversations. There's nothing graphic or even explicit but it's a bit more grown up than the other chapters. Use the appropriate caution.

summaries: A Marauders Era long fic. Inside Hogwarts, four boys grow up in a Golden Age of pranks, fun, feasts and friendship. These are their glory days; white Christmases and hazy summers, stretching ahead of them for an eternity, and them the kings of their own magical castle. But outside the castle walls, their little world is growing more dangerous. Dark wizards are on the move and, year by year, the threat of all out war creeps ever closer.First 4 years Complete (see inside for separate summaries)Fifth Year: Curses, capers and Quidditch abound as the boys enter their OWL year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Snape is on the prowl, foreign wizards are descending on the school, and this year had better be the year they become animagi - or Sirius will *explode*. But when the boys find evidence of a Death Eater plot happening right beneath their noses, they realise that the time for innocence is over, and the war has finally entered the castle for real.10/20Updating weekly

summaries: In the aftermath of the war, all marked Death Eaters are imprisoned in Azkaban for a minimum of fifteen years.After a hard fight, Harry Potter and Blaise Zabini managed to get some of the Death Eaters released under certain conditions. One of these conditions is that they must marry a Muggle, a Squib or a Muggleborn.Draco Malfoy, locked up for the past seven years and abused by vengeful wardens, is freed and finds himself married to Hermione Granger, who will take him in at her farm in the Pyrenees, where she fled to try to rebuild her life.But war and imprisonment have left their mark on all of them and between anxiety, agoraphobia and post-traumatic stress, they will have to relearn how to live and not just to survive.This fic is illustrated.Covers by @iamrosetta & @chestercompanyPlaylist for the fic, and explanation about my choices of musics.A chapter every 10 days.

summaries: Merlin generally does his best to stay out of magical affairs, or at least, he likes to think he does. But after one chance encounter in Diagon Alley, a seemly incompetent new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, and a fight in a bookstore, Merlin finds himself starting a new position as the History of Magic professor at Hogwarts. Unfortunately, he also finds himself under heavy suspicion from both Harry and his friends and members of Hogwarts's staff when the Chamber of Secrets is mysteriously opened once again.

summaries: Sounds like your sleepwalking is getting worse, little one. The ink shone bright as words appeared, sleek and sharp, on the diary's pages. If Hermione let her fingers coast gently over the parchment, she wondered whether her skin would be stained, marked by his words. You’re overexerting yourself. You said you were in the library late last night? Hermione's heart pounded in her chest.She hated lying to Caliban, but felt no inclination to tell him the truth, either. If he discovered she preferred spending her evenings being tutored by her Potions professor, she didn’t know whether he’d praise her for being so studious or question her growing interest in the subject. Caliban was a possessive man, though he lived in a book and had no real claim on her. Actually, she couldn’t fully determine whether he was a man. Or a thing. Or an entity.He seemed like a man, though. He made her feel like a woman.

summaries: Harry's twin sister Iris was left with a far more insidious wound than him that night. With her magic left all but shattered, seemingly as powerless and faltering as a ray of light, even the simplest spells elude her grasp.A quest to unravel and wield the broken pieces leads her into the forbidden realm of rituals and dark magic. But the path to power is a treacherous one, and the road to hell is paved with good intentions. In an effort to try and protect her friends she will defy even the laws of Magic itself.Slight AU with rapidly growing canon divergence. No bashing. No WBWL.

summaries: Au lendemain de la guerre, tous les mangemorts ayant été Marqués sont enfermés à Azkaban pour une peine minimale de quinze ans.Après une lutte acharnée, Harry Potter et Blaise Zabini parviennent à faire libérer certains mangemorts sous certaines conditions. L'une d'entre elles : ils devront épouser une moldue, une cracmol ou une Née-Moldue.Drago Malefoy, enfermé depuis sept ans et maltraité par des gardes rancuniers, est libéré et se retrouve marié à Hermione Granger, qui l'hébergera dans sa ferme au milieu des Pyrénées, là où elle s'est enfuie pour tenter de se reconstruire.Mais la guerre et l'emprisonnement leur ont laissé à tous deux des traces et entre anxiété, agoraphobie et stress post-traumatique, ils devront réapprendre à vivre et non plus survivre.Couverture de l'histoire dessinée par @iamrosetta

summaries: An AU of the Marauders in the popular children's TV show The Next Step.Regulus Black has left his dance studio, Elite, to join The Next Step for the road to Regionals. Reunited with his brother, he begins to feel at home at this new studio and has his eye on his brother's best friend. However, with unexpected secrets and a lot of drama, the road to regionals may not be so smooth.So I started writing this as a joke and then I ended up finishing it, which I wasn't anticipating. It it possibly one of the most stupid ideas I have ever had. Since this fanfiction isn't really serious, the dialogue will be a little cringy in true Next Step fashion, character dynamics might be slightly off, relationships rushed, etc. It is quite obvious this is written as a really stupid idea, but I had a great time writing it. I took some plot points from the tv series and it mainly follows season one with a few plot points taken from season two. You don't need to have watched it to understand this.So...enjoy? Maybe?

summaries: The old man stopped in front of his bed, he had glittery blue eyes that shone with something the young boy couldn’t place, but the grown version of him would never miss again. It was as if he had found an essential piece, the missing twelve-lettered word in the daily newspaper crossword Four destinies already written before they even knew, played by a mastermind with no heart. We all know their story and their tragic ends, but what if they deciphered the puzzled that let them live? Kind of my take on ATYD, you will see some scenes inspired in the original work, but there are some characters and storyline that I made up.Hope you enjoy :)Pd: English isn't my first language so I'm doing the best I can with the help of the internet with the slangs, don't come after me pls.

summaries: We have made our choice, dear. A velvet voice that could barely be heard in the dark of the night in the confines of the great Malfoy manor rushed. There is no going back from that.I am aware. A man retorted sternly, and if his voice had cracked in the middle of it, neither of them chose to acknowledge it. There is no place in this family for him anymore. His voice held a nonchalant tone, even thought his wife could see all the way through his facade, she knew better than to comment on it.Surely not. She, too, was good at schooling her features and presenting indifference. But in the security of their home, there was nothing stopping her from placing her hand on his shoulder and squeezing it to show comfort for her spouse.Not any more words were spoken about that matter that night, and on a faraway place nowhere near the manor a child was left in front of the gates of a house at the mercy of those who lived in it.• • •Aka the one fanfic where Draco is a vampire, because I felt like it, and is raised by the Tonks. He somehow befriends the golden trio, plus some other additions, and gets involved in it all.

summaries: James lets out a bitter, pained laugh. “Am I so horrible? That you won’t even look at me, anymore?” There’s a whole world, outside this room. Of dysfunctional people. Of money. Of pain and glory. Of a throne he wants more than anything. But here, blanketed in suffocating snow and the ardent clamouring of his overwhelming, pervasive hunger, Regulus almost struggles to remember it. “No. Not horrible,” he murmurs, throaty, lips burning as he painstakingly drags his gaze to him. “Consuming.” The Black family is known for controlling Greyscar Co, the biggest media and entertainment conglomerate in the American wizarding world; for years, their title has been unchallenged and their influence has been extensive, shaping the collective consciousness of witches and wizards nationally. But with their patriarch's impending retirement and a formidable rival on the horizon, the family's grip on power weakens- then threatens to slip away entirely.

summaries: The curious thing about vampirism, Hermione thought, was that it left those affected by it frozen in time for so long that they forgot themselves. They remembered the basics, of course – vague memories of their human lives, the most basic parts of themselves that stayed stagnant long enough to become Truth, and that there had once been a time when they didn’t crave blood. But none of them would be able to look at a photograph and know that they were looking at themselves.And, to Hermione, that was the most heartbreaking piece of it all.

summaries: There were times when I hated my soulmate, times when I despised her and detested her; but despite hatred and hostility, in war and in peace: always, always, it was her... Hermione Granger knows everything.Except this: when she accepts a bet to seduce her onetime enemy Draco Malfoy, hoping to enliven an otherwise uneventful eighth year at Hogwarts, she will tangle the web of Fate more intricately than either of them could ever imagine.Draco Malfoy knows everything - about love.Born with the rare gift of seeing the red threads that bind soulmates to each other, he’s known, since the day he met Hermione Granger, that she is his soulmate. More than this: he knows who her soulmate is - and it's not him.But destiny is for other people.And so Draco returns to Hogwarts for his eighth year, disgraced and friendless, but more determined than ever, resolving to defy his soul and his destiny - the universe too, if he must - and, for the first time in his life, take the threads of Fate into his own hands. [slow burn soulmates AU with a twist (and lots of scheming along the way). hogwarts eighth year, and beyond.]

summaries: After a devastating defeat in the Battle of Hogwarts, Hermione is one of only two members of the Order to survive. Taken prisoner and forced to await certain torture and death, she must explore the only remaining way to change the fate of the war: the past. Unfortunately, time is a very fickle thing.—Hermione found a nearby chair and pulled it close to Malfoy’s sickbed. “Listen to me, Malfoy. I know you don’t know who I am, but—”He gave her an oddly amused half smirk that was no less annoying than usual, despite his current appearance. “No, I know who you are.”She swallowed nervously and replied, “You do?” If he knew her identity, there’s no way he’d think she was from the present. He’d probably just seen the present Hermione in class this week and she looked vastly different. If he knew she was time travelling, they could cause a temporal paradox and fracture the very nature of time itself. But why on earth would he be holding Hermione’s hand?

summaries: Pansy Parkinson has lost almost everything: her home, her status, and even a few friends. In a desperate bid to get their life back, she is tasked by her father to seduce and marry the man who took it all away. Under the guise of being a matchmaker for her best friend, Astoria Greengrass, Pansy infiltrates General Neville Longbottom's life. Soon, the line between seduction and genuine emotion becomes blurred. The more she learns about him, the more her home life unravels. And when her mother is caught in a letter exchange with Death Eaters, Pansy will have to decide which is more important: duty, or her heart.A Matchless Proposal is a Regency AU romance novel-length fic with short chapters, set in a Post-war Harry Potter universe.

Its teeth were bared, a snarl etched on its otherwise beautiful features.

Their newest target? The Golden Girl.Now as the main target of the Death Eaters, Hermione has been placed under the protection of ex-Death Eater Draco Malfoy in an attempt to keep her safe during their last year at Hogwarts.In addition to being assigned to keep Hermione safe, the Ministry of Magic has also recruited Draco to spy on and dismantle the Death Eaters from inside their ranks with the promise of his record being wiped clean if he succeeds.Together, they will navigate what it means to be bound by blood status, breaking those stereotypes, finding themselves through hardship, all the while discovering that maybe, they aren’t that different after all.

summaries: Remus Lupin is freshly twenty years old and sitting on a park bench in central London, he has a squashed pastry bag next to him and a cup of tea clutched between perpetually cold fingers.He moved to London eight months ago in search of a new doctor after having grown up on a little farm in Wales, and he hasn’t taken well to city life. He's taken to this park mostly because the trees are dense, the people are sparse, and there are birds. Nice ones that sing and hop from bench to bench scavenging for dropped bits of food or else pulling worms from the earth. Today he’s watching a pair of ducks glide easily across the pond. He thinks they must have a nest nearby, and in a few weeks there will be ducklings.Or...Remus Lupin has always been sick, and he'd just like to feel normal for once. Sirius Black seems like the perfect man with a perfect, exciting life.

summaries: All is lost. Voldemort may have fallen but so has everyone else. Hermione is the only one still standing in the mess of Britain, an old letter from Dumbledore in one hand and a time turner in her other. His portrait explains everything she has to do, playing her like a pawn in a game that none of them were winning - and so she lets him, sending herself back thirty years.Fate plays its hand, giving her a background and a surname that will offer some protection as she figures out a way to save everyone she has ever known, plus the people she has just met, all while reliving her childhood in a new era with the future carefully clutched in her hands, threatening to expose itself and make her journey worthless.

Oh, when you love it.” In a world where werewolf discrimination runs rampant, where a new Minister is up for election, where a series of child murders has been terrorizing the Wizarding community… Neville works as an Auror, hiding the bite mark on his arm, caring for his Gran, and wondering if he’ll always feel incomplete.In a world where the field of genetics has begun to trickle into the magical world, a prophecy drags Hermione from her comfortable apartment in New York. She’s a Healer, and hides her own scars with glamour charms and turtlenecks. Her feelings, however, are more difficult to hide.Will their forced proximity finally let them figure out their feelings for each other? Will warring werewolf packs drag them in opposite directions? Will the secrets between them tear them apart or bring them together?
