summaries: As Hermione stands and looks out over the Magical emergency department at St Mungo’s Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries she smiles – This is exactly where she is supposed to be. The war is over, her friends are safe and happy, and she has finally decided on a career she loves. Everything is going right.Until Draco Malfoy – Fourth Year Resident Healer is assigned as her well-being and education Resident, how can the boy who spent so many years tormenting her, who watched as his aunt tortured her and didn’t lift a finger to help be left in charge of her well-being and her career?As what should have been an exciting, over-tiring, and joyful Intern year descends into a drawl of sarcastic comments, infuriating smirks, and a building tension that makes Hermione feel like an elastic band primed to snap, a group of Wizards hell-bent on re-enacting a long forgotten Wizarding law, begins to spread its poison – threatening to overturn everything Hermione and her friends fought for.(This is what happens when you watch to much Grey’s Anatomy while reading Dramione fics!Note: my superpower is dyslexia, spelling and grammar is my kryptonite, so be kind and enjoy)

summaries: When Harry willingly sacrificed himself for the sake of the Wizarding World as was expected of him, he never imagined for a second he'd wake up in a strange chamber surrounded by people both dead and alive.He certainly never expected Mother Magic herself to show up. Or that she'd be disappointed with his sacrifice.He also didn't expect her to decide that almost his entire life needed to be redone... And the way she described that like it was a reasonable suggestion was unnerving at best. Terrifying at worst.Harry had thought he'd finally fulfilled his destiny, only to learn that he was destined to so much more than death at the hands of a dark lord.Armed with seven books, each filled with details of Harry's life he'd rather keep private, Harry and the others settle in for a lesson from Mother Magic on where they all went so horribly wrong.Harry and co have received the fourth book detailing his life at Hogwarts and so the story continues.

summaries: “I saw your scars. The big ones across your chest.” Sirius says the words like throwing acid, because that's how he felt when he saw them. That's how he feels every time he thinks about Remus getting sliced up. “Were they all accidents?”When Remus finally looks at him it is the look of someone who is beyond sadness. Moved past it, transcended. I bet this is what a holy person would look like, Sirius thinks and he almost hates him for it.“My father is sloppy and we don't have a good relationship. But he didn't do this. It's just a condition I have where I get sick often and easily bleed. I'm not well, Sirius, but I don't like to talk about it.Sirius shifts what Remus said around for a moment, like carrying a load and figuring out how best to hold it. Remus can be so fucking heavy. The dead-weight of his denial presses into Sirius's back and shoulders and every part of him that has ever known the violence of anger.* * *Marauders-at-Hogwarts fic that spans their seven years. Come for the pranks, stay for the not-so-slow burn.

summaries: In the aftermath of the war and haunted by the losses, Mary chose oblivion to shield herself, with Lily steadfastly by her side. Together, they carved out a peaceful existence in a secluded cottage in the Scottish countryside. Amidst their tranquil refuge, their bond deepened, yet shadows of the past loomed large, intertwining their fates with unspoken burdens. Padfoot remained concealed by their side, his presence a closely guarded secret. In the tragedy of their youngest heir's demise, a pall had cast over the noble and most ancient house of Black, leaving them vulnerable to the relentless pursuit of the Ministry, as accusations swirled and suspicions grew.

summaries: 'And then he greeted Death as an old friend, and went with him gladly, and, equals, they departed this life,' she recited those words in her head. They were the last thing she thought about as she embraced the spell, embraced Death. But Death is cruel.Years and years of war would exhaust a soul, straining it and wringing it dry with no escape except death. However, Death had a different plan for Hermione Granger, the brightest witch of her age. Her soul was transferred to a girl who was supposed to be dead. A handsome dark wizard had made sure of that. Or so he thought.After a life overshadowed by sorrow, Hermione is presented with the opportunity to embrace a new life. This is the epilogue of her soul.

It was only possible with the help of Kreacher, and of Anna Longbottom, sister of Frank Longbottom. Now he was healthy and comfortable living under his false identity of Ryan Nero, a successful Owlet Trainer and Potioneer for most of wizarding Europe. Even if he was a widower with twin children.Lyra A. Black and twin brother Cetus S. Black, pureblood children of Regulus and Anna Black. After years of the best tutors Regulus could easily afford for his two children, they were finally old enough to be enrolled into Hogwarts; causing the whole Black family to be forced to move back to England.

summaries: In 1994 another year starts at Hogwarts, welcoming another Malfoy. Things don't go as everyone expected, though - when Draco's annoying little brother is sorted into a house other than Slytherin, he has to step up and make friends with Gryffindors to protect him, lest the brat gets himself in trouble and dies tragically. While Draco is faking smiles for his brother's sake, he finds solace in one lonely green-eyed boy, who seems to be losing friends on the cusp of the Triwizard Tournament. As Draco tries navigating his life between living up to his Father's expectations and protecting his brother from stray stinging hexes, he has to realize there's more to life than never ending rules and pureblood decorum; on the eve of Voldemort's return he has to make a choice, and with every single minute spent with Potter he's less and less sure of the answer.

summaries: The sweet scent of aconites floated lazily in the air. It tickled the noses of sleeping portraits and delighted the sentient suits of armor. It travelled through long hallways, embedded itself into heavy curtains and rugs and eventually managed to escape into the cool night air where the moon shone almost as brightly as she did. Follow my OC as she studies at Hogwarts and fights for what she believes in. The story follows the plot of the Harry Potter -series somewhat loosely. (It's been a while since I read the books and this story focuses on my OC's original point of view, anyway.)While the plot and characters of Harry Potter are owned by J.K. Rowling and not by me - I have to say that I don't like what the original author stands for. I do, however, like her characters and I'm very inspired by the world of magic.

summaries: Going back in time was certainly not part of Lord Voldemort's plans.The new Master of Death had a personal grudge against him, and apparently he shouldn't have killed his parents and other people he cared about. How could Voldemort have foreseen that Harry Potter would become Master of Death? He didn't even know it was possible.Oh, and he forgot to mention that he had also changed universes. Not that he'd had a big change, on the contrary, it was so faithful to the few memories he had that it haunted him.It's all Potter's fault, he always messes up his plans. - Tell me what it is.From the irritation evident on Potter's adult face, he didn't like taking orders. He had at least one character trait in common with his mini him.- Tell me if this is fast enough for you: you have to go back to the past, relive your life without becoming a psychopathic killer.[...]- What's in it to win for me?- Much more than you think. You will also have a return to your original body.[...]He needed to know the reasons for Death.- What's in it to win for you?- I don't know. I am Death, not the Fates. Écrit en français

summaries: Sirius hesitated for a second, then a raspy laugh escaped his throat and rolled against Remus’ chest. “Missed me much, Moony?” His fingers were cold when they dug into Remus’ back.“Don't flatter yourself.”“Well, I certainly missed you.”“Ah.”“That’s the part where you finally admit you did as well, you arse.” Remus is still hopelessly in love with Sirius. That much isn't new to him, even if he has tried to bury these feelings for the last fourteen years.And, of course, he would never turn Sirius away, who just shows up at his door to take shelter for a few days - he can totally handle this like an adult and bury his feelings even deeper.Except that doesn't work out at all, somehow.

summaries: In the land of Britannia, magic is highly prevalent in the world but even those with an affinity for it are often unable to access it without help from a higher power, mostly by dedicating themselves to either the Temple of Arthur or the Temple of Merlin.The Temple of Merlin was the home of the Order of the Phoenix, where Harry Potter grew up and trained to be a Healer. He had been living there since he somehow defeated the Dark Lord Voldemort. When there is news that the Dark Lord was once again walking in the world, the Ministry sets up a crusade and calls the on various parties including the Order of the Phoenix and a renegade group of the children of Death Eaters, led by Severus Snape.Join Harry on his adventure to help take down this new, evil threat as he learns how sheltered his life had been at the temple and he realises just how many issues there are in the magical world. Are the problems caused by some evil mastermind, a corrupt government, or are the issues closer to Harry's home than he might have ever suspected?

summaries: Hermione Jean Granger is successful, with everything she touches turning to practically gold. Blinded by her accomplishments and the highest praise from any superior she’s had so far, she believes that she has successfully moulded the Wizarding World to think like her and that they are better for it.What she has failed to do is to properly consider the nuances left behind in her wake before moving onto her next project time and time again.When she receives correspondence from a burgeoning Muggle and Beings lobby group, she believes she can impart her “golden touch” again. What she doesn’t anticipate when she accepts the new project is the pushback she receives from the people that she thinks will be working under her. Namely, a very hostile Draco Malfoy who doesn’t want to be another “notch on her belt”. She is steadfast in her belief that he is the problem. How could anyone, even Draco “Bloody Delusional” Malfoy reasonably think that a perfectly coifed, platinum blond, blood purist prat could lecture her about Muggleborns and what they want.As the power struggle ensues, Hermione is confronted with her origins, her own actions and the actual legacy she has left behind.

summaries: If someone had asked Maya Potter six months ago what she was expecting to do today, she probably wouldn’t have answered with; knocking on a strangers door and greeting them with the words:“Hi, I’m your goddaughter.”If someone had asked Damon Salvatore what he was expecting to do when he woke up that evening, he probably wouldn’t have answered with, opening his door to find a child greeting him with the words:“Hi, I’m your goddaughter.”Neither of them ever expected to be in this position but now one sassy pre-teen runaway witch and one sarcastic 170-year-old vampire are going to learn that family is what you make it.

summaries: Sirius Black loved “Spin the Bottle”. The stupid little muggle game that Mary had introduced them all to at the first party of the year. It was stupid and fun and made him feel like the teenager he was instead of the young adult he would soon be. He loved the casual voyeurism of it and how sometimes when two people kissed they had chemistry that no one expected. He loved how many people looked at him with hunger in their eyes when he spun the bottle, their casual adoration feeding him like a hearty meal. He loved how when the bottle did fall on him, and more often than not, the person's eyes were filled with joy and thanks. When their lips finally met, they possessed a needy air that he was oh so willing to meet.He also loved how much Remus hated it. As soon as it was brought up, the quiet boy with the serious eyes and quiet demeanour would scrunch up his nose and immediately try to run. He would eventually be brought into the fold and sit with his eyes cast downward at his feet, refusing to watch the spectacle all around him. Every once in a while, the bottle would stop in his direction and he would look up in abject terror; his cheeks growing redder with every step forward the intended kisser took.

summaries: In the heat of June, James Potter is going through a harsh breakup, he did not want. He is also losing himself slowly and painfully as all the emotions he has been burying underneath the surface are catching up to him. In the midst of it all, he meets Regulus Black, Sirius' younger brother. Regulus, who unexpectedly is the first person to notice the real James Potter, one who hides behind smiles and laughter.In the heat of June, Regulus Black is coming to stay with his brother for his summer vacation. He plans to spend a luxurious and comfortable time during his stay. What he does not expect, is to see the cracked edges of James Potter and become inexplicably drawn to him.Three months is all it takes for these two to fall in love and mess it all up.

summaries: “This is a bad idea.” Elphias whispered. “The worst you ever had and that means something. Because you always have bad ideas, Albus.”He quirked an eyebrow. “Always?”“Well, alright, sometimes. But that’s not the point right now.” His friend looked anxious. “You can’t just throw your name into the Goblet of Fire to prove Grindelwald wrong. There has to be another way.”In Albus' last year at school, the Triwizard Tournament takes place at Hogwarts. With it arrives a certain young man, who drives Albus crazy with his infuriating behaviour and ridiculously good looks. His name's Gellert Grindelwald and this is the story of how they get to know (and hate) each other, risk their lives in an ancient wizarding competition and fall in love along the way. ALBUS x GELLERT

summaries: They hadn't wanted to get married in the first place, but they really hadn't wanted to be imprisoned. So on a sunny day at the start of June they chose the lesser of two evils. Then at some point, between yearly liaisons to maintain their marriage status and bringing two children into the world, they became friends. Until the law is overturned and they're left divorced from someone they never shared their feelings with in the first place.For years, they spent nearly every weekend at this playground together; they may not have been a couple, but they were a family. In a cruel way, it was fitting that Bitts Park was now the place they met to exchange backpacks and children every other weekend.

summaries: Scorpius Malfoy heads off to his first year of Hogwarts alone. His bestfriend isn't old enough to attend yet and everyone who meets him takes one look at his signature Maloy blonde hair and sneers at him because of his family history. That is until three unlikely kids enter his train compartment and treat him like an equal. And one boy in particular makes Scorpius smile more than he thought he could.But would Al Potter still want to be friends with Scorpius if he started acting different? summaries: Lily realizes one thing the 31st October of 1981: Dumbledore can't protect them. She decides she can't get rid of Voldemort herself and needs her friends, all of them, to be united against the common enemy. For that, she digs in her power as a Dark Witch and rewinds time with James at her side.Now that they've defeated Voldemort, Lily can rest and watches her son go through Hogwarts peacefully, like he was meant to be. Except he wasn't meant to do that, and now he's in Slytherin, he has a crush on a blonde boy who is the absolute worst, and Voldemort might not be that defeated after all.

summaries: When Regulus saw the post on James' Twitter confirming his suspicions were true, he wanted to cry. He also wanted to punch Lily Evans in her beautiful face. All the post was, was a dainty, freckled, pale hand with a ring on the ring finger with an annoyingly large diamond in the center of a silver band with the caption being just as irritating, 'I (finally) put a ring on it!'Regulus rolls his eyes. What is it? asks Pandora. He showed her the photo with visible disgust. Oh, Reggie, just remember you were the one who called it off.He huffs. Yeah, I know. That's only because of my terrible contract with my mother and if we got caught. Now look at him, he's getting married. ~~Or, ~~ Regulus is the most popular male singer of the year and gets nominated for a Grammy, so when the Marauders get nominated for Best Rock Band, Regulus and James have to talk again after breaking up, two years later. I don't support Rowling nor her revolting transphobic views. And to her, I say, fuck you :)

summaries: This story will follow some of our most beloved characters forward in time past The Battle of Hogwarts. We'll find out how they're faring in the aftermath of Britain's Second Wizarding War and watch them cope with some startling new circumstances. For some, tragedy takes its toll while others are more able to shake off the post-war gloom. We'll find out what everyone's doing over the summer, see friends reconnect, and watch some relationships shift and change. But most importantly, we'll see what happens when some of them return to the castle in September to finish their educations and watch as those who don't begin to forge new paths.Adventure awaits but new enemies might just be lurking somewhere!Join us to catch up with some of your old favorites and to check out some new friends we'll meet along the way!

summaries: With it out in the open between them that Tom Riddle is actually Lord Voldemort, reborn from a stray piece of soul which incubated within Harry for nearly ten years, nourished by his love, he and Harry prepare to return to Hogwarts for their third year. However, it seems that nothing but challenges await them in their future; with Horcruxes to collect, a frightfully clever headmaster to keep his secrets away from, and now, supposedly, Voldemort's right-hand-man (who Tom doesn't remember at all) out for Harry's blood. And that's not even counting the older version of himself, floating out there somewhere as a wraith. Luckily, Tom has Harry and Harry has Tom, and together they can surely keep each other safe.

summaries: Three witches, Lily, Marlene, and Mary. They explore their years throughout Hogwarts, hand in hand, facing challenges they weren't sure if they were ready for, but they're doing it together so it shouldn't be too bad. Should it?Lily, a clever witch who can recall any piece of information, but she's mistaken for bragging her power.Marlene, the best Beater anyone has ever seen at Hogwarts, but she's a girl, most people see past her skill.Mary, a protector in the stands who uses her voice in a crowd, but she's a girl who's mistaken for talking nonsense.With the struggles of the world revolving in their direction towards the pain, can they come together and be brave for one another? Can they learn to quit arguing and fighting each other, and instead fight the world for peace? Can the three girls remember their times back at Hogwarts? The running around into secret passageways, the loud giggles during lessons, the useless snogging, the pranks which were mostly blamed on the Marauders, and the twist and turns of each season representing just how quick time has gotten.

summaries: “This is the most stupid thing you’ve ever done!” Hermione yells after Harry. Then she blinks. They’re no longer at Grimmauld Place and, sitting huddled together on a familiar four-poster bed with red hangings, are four teenaged boys, staring avidly at them. Well, this is just brilliant, she thinks. “And you didn’t even get the year right!”  Or: the one in which Harry is done with the war and thinks it’s time he got something he wanted for a change. He misses his godfather, goddammit.

summaries: It's late 85', and Narcissa Malfoy is out in London, strolling the streets elegantly. As she passes by an ordinary orphanage, she hears the shrilling howls of children. Alerted, she shift her stare from the street to the windows of the building, just before they shatter under the blast of a nil explosion. The starry night is suddenly hidden behind a veil of fumes and smoke, and a crowd escapes the building in both fright and haste. When the fog finally dissipates, Narcissa witnesses countless snakes running from the orphanage. Wand in hand, courage at heart, Narcissa enters the place and makes a surprising discovery—a child who speaks Parseltongue.Now, it's 96'. It's been over eleven years since Narcissa sheltered the child, raised her, and taught her how to control her magic. She even gave her a name: Alcina. Alcina is seventeen, reckless, and bellicose. Wherever she goes, chaos follows. The Ministry of Magic is urging Narcissa to send her to school. The ultimatum is clear: Alcina goes to Hogwarts and gets properly trained, or she faces a dire fate in Azkaban. Unsurprisingly, Narcissa chose Hogwarts.

summaries: Albus Potter is nothing like his father. He would be the first to tell you that. When he embarks on his journey to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, he is accompanied by little more than feelings of isolation and frustration. The cold-eyed stranger and dark rumor he encounters on the train certainly don’t help.After an unforeseen sorting and a society grappling with a faceless threat of extinction, Albus is forced to rethink everything he knows about his family, his world, and himself. Embarking on a journey of self discovery with an unexpected alliance, he must define the things that truly matter and how far he’ll go to protect them.(See notes below)

summaries: All potions come with a warning. A warning that was taught to Potions Masters only and seemed to be lost over time as less and less Potions Masters seem to remember them. For example, in an ancient book about different versions of Polyjuice Potion, there are numerous side effects and warnings until on the last page, there is one without any.The one that is usually taught.Not the one that Hermione found in their second year.And not the one they actually try.Had Hermione found the ancient book with the warnings, she wouldn’t have brewed it. But as fate likes to play with the Golden Trio, she didn’t. Otherwise she would have read the following words above the potions. Not to hide thy visage but showeth thy true one. And now Harry, Hermione and Ron have to come to terms with what has been done to them. They will find new friends, allies and enemies.

summaries: — Первая команда, которую я послал, смущала Мстителей постоянными благодарностями и выпрашивала автографы. Следующая группа воровала вещи, чтобы продать их на «eBay». Ребята после них даже не прошли через парадную дверь, потому что система безопасности Старка нашла что-то в их прошлом, что мы пропустили. Четвёртая команда получила моральную травму после уборки комнаты Тора, вроде бы, там у бога была какая-то обезглавленная птица, капавшая кровью в чашу. И после этого ни одна группа, которую я посылал, так или иначе не продержалась больше трёх дней. Я уверен, что один из этих придурков развлекается, отпугивая моих сотрудников.— Я думаю, что вам не стоит называть героев Нью-Йорка придурками.ИлиУборка за Мстителями включает в себя куда больше, чем просто холодное удаление пятен крови с ковра. К счастью, Спасительница волшебного мира провела последнее десятилетие, избавляясь от Пожирателей смерти, так что с этой задачей она справится. Ничто: ни розыгрыши, ни птичьи трупы, ни неопознанная слизь — не помешает ей наводить порядок.

summaries: Regulus spent his whole life knowing intimately what it felt like to be afraid.He and Sirius grew up in an environment that painfully cultivated fear. He learned to listen carefully for creaking floorboards, for the swish of a wand that would inflict pain, for the hiss of a muttered curse—he learned to be a careful boy, and he was perpetually afraid. His very bones were made of fear, they trembled and shook with the weight of great worry. But one day, Regulus saw James Potter jump in front of a curse meant for him—and he realized he didn’t know what true fear was until that moment. - or; an exploration of Regulus Black's fear and love, intertwined.

summaries: Regulus Black has a thirst for vengeance. It pulses and tears at his heart like a hook, pulling him into a bloodbath of violence and misery. He yearns for revenge with every bone of his body, every tendon and muscle.Dorcas Meadowes is in the same boat. She, as well, wishes to lay out her enemies and arrange their guts in an orderly fashion, one fit for proper dissection. She as well wishes to shove the pain of her torturers back down their throats.But what happens when one (or both) of them plummets headfirst into love? Will their plans of revenge fall short in order to keep it, or will they grow bloodier and heated as their loves are threatened by the possibility of those from the criminal world striking at their prized possessions? Will the love turn them crueler, or soften their delicately laid plans?Throughout their story, love will mix into lies and scalding lashes of heartbreak, stirring bitterly with simmering blood and tears. And in the end, will they all survive this mess, or will they all conclude crawling, landed in heaps and reaching for detached limbs?

summaries: When Hermione Granger, now nearing her thirties, does not get the promotion she earned because she is a muggle-born witch, and in the meantime gets pressured to find herself a husband, she decides to get to the root of all her problems. What better way to do so, than becoming the next Minister for Magic?“I would watch your tongue,” a bored voice drawled from Hermione’s doorway. “I wouldn’t harass our future Minister, McLaggen. After all, Granger will be your boss one day. That is if she doesn’t report you and your actions to your Head of Department first.”“Malfoy,” Hermione whispered, taking in her childhood nemesis as he leaned against her doorway, his black cloak draped lazily over his arm.

summaries: “Sirius!”Sirius jumped, looking up from the letter in his hands and scowling when he saw Regulus standing next to his chair. “Reg,” he said distastefully. I expect you know what this is all about, then? He held up the howler. “Been dobbing on me to mummy, have you?“No.” For once, Regulus wasn’t wearing the displeased sneer that he normally adopted any time he was forced to speak to Sirius. Instead he looked pale and frightened, and he glanced around anxiously before speaking again in a hushed voice. “I didn’t have anything to do with this. But you’re about to be in really big trouble, Sirius.”Sirius felt his annoyance fade, cold dread taking its place. “...What kind of trouble?”Regulus gulped. “... I tried to reason with Mum,” he whispered. “I tried to tell her to wait ‘till you got home to talk to you about it, but she’s just so livid-”“Regulus, what kind of trouble?” Sirius repeated, his rapidly-growing panic causing his voice to raise.Over holiday break, they had Kreacher search your room.” Sirius froze, feeling all of the colour drain from his face. Oh, Godric, no.***Walburga finds letters from Remus under Sirius' bed and sends him a Howler at Hogwarts

summaries: “If you leave now you'll no longer be a Malfoy,” his father shouted, drawing his wand and pointing it at Draco's chest.  “Good,” Draco shouted back, his left hand forming a fist around a slip of paper bearing his Aunt's address.  His mother grabbed at her husband's arm, tears flowing down her cheeks. Draco took one last long look at her, then closed his eyes and twisted on the spot. He disapparated with a crack.  A disinherited Draco Black (formerly Malfoy) returns to Hogwarts for an optional eighth year having transferred to Ravenclaw. He's completely unaware that a certain bushy-haired, muggleborn witch has also been granted a fresh start in his new house.

summaries: Regulus Black is tired. Tired enough that, while interviewing for his dream job he apparently told his interviewer all about his fiancé and child (that he doesn't have). Actually, told is the wrong term. Zoned out and nodded along is a more fair assessment, really. He was snapped into reality when he started asking more specific questions about his partner. Which, always the compulsive liar and star people-pleaser when he panics, Regulus tells him that the kid being his partner's from a previous relationship and oh, now he's screwed. But he also really needs this job.James Potter has been a single dad since his fiancée broke off their engagement and disappeared. It's been a year and his friends are trying to convince him to put himself back out there, to date, to meet people, to get laid ffs. James just isn't ready to move on. To get them off his back, he convinces his best friend to stage a bunch of Instagram posts where you can't see his face to try to pass him off as his new boyfriend. Suddenly, his friends want to meet this boy he calls his little star. Problem is, Sirius isn't willing to keep up the charade. Now he has to find someone who looks like Sirius and is also crazy enough to agree to fake date him.

summaries: But here Bellatrix fought and raged. Sirius screamed curse after curse but he was never the duelist Bellatrix was. She could see it as clearly as she had seen anything in her life. Sirius would die here by Bellatrix's hand. Daemon would deliver a promise he had made to her a lifetime ago. Bellatrix raised her wand, “Avada-“ If you had told Rhaenyra that she was to be roasted alive and eaten by her brothers dragon she would let you know that surely she would return to her children’s sides in the afterlife. That the Gods watched her and knew her hearts deepest wish was to see them again. Indeed, the Gods knew. But it seemed she wasn’t done being tossed around, now she must navigate life as the daughter of a house close to ruin. Even now she was watched, but this time she turned and looked back.

summaries: Rose Potter is smart and cunning. Maybe that's why she didn't fall for their traps. Or perhaps it was because the God of Death was at her side guiding her and protecting her. The day she got her Hogwarts letter she knew something was wrong, for why else would a magical child be left with someone who hates magic? To find out the truth she went back to Diagon Alley to get aid from the goblins. The truth was far worse than what an 11 year old should be facing, all alone. But she wasn’t alone. Not really.This is the story of Rose Potter and how she defied those who sought to control her and found love along the way. More love than she could ever imagine she would be receiving from people she was supposed to fear and hate. But what is the truth? summaries: The cuff sat innocently at the bottom of the box, just as modest and unembellished as its housing. Tom twisted his wand around his fingers. He tapped the tip of the length of yew against the circle of gold. Nothing. Tom tapped it again, and a third time, but the results of each spell declared there were no curses or magic on the cuff. It was just gold, and Tom had always been a bit of a magpie. He did not hesitate to reach in and slide the band over his hand to his wrist. Tom knew you only ever got what you took...Tom Riddle makes a regrettable choice as a sixteen year old, but the consequences lie in wait for the fateful day where Voldemort possesses Harry Potter in the atrium of the Ministry. Flung into an alternate reality by quantum magic, the unlikely pair must find a way back to where they came from. But Voldemort will soon realise he is not the scariest thing out there.***More tags may be added in the future***

summaries: The reader is quiet, lonely, and trying to focus on studies to distract herself from bad memories, an event that had taken place just before the school year began.A sixteen year old in 7th year is trying to battle her demons, whilst also enduring new unexpected traumas and dealing with the aftermath.* * * * *(Excerpt from Chapter 2: Red)“Fred,” I hear one say to the other. She needs help. Go get someone. Anyone.”I hear punches from the floor scuffle. George puts a hand to the side of my face and looks at me with worried eyes. I start to shiver, and my breathing is uneven. He looks scared. He turns round and sends a stunning spell at him on the floor. He stills. “Fred - stop. He’s not going anywhere. But she needs help. Go. Get someone, anyone. I’ll stay with her.”Fred takes one look at me and immediately jumps into action. He sends one last kick to the shins of the immobile boy on the floor. “Go”, George urges. Fred rushes over and out of the common room door.* * * * * * *“WEASLEY.” A response. Dammit, it’s Snape.

summaries: Truthfully, if there was one thing to know about Henry, it is that he is an older brother before he’s a friend, a student, or a person. With two younger brothers and one younger sister to help his father care for, he spent so long caring for people that it felt wrong not to do so. That being said, it was a bit of a surprise to be placed in Gryffindor rather than Hufflepuff(or so he’s been told). He’d pondered about it consistently throughout his first week at Hogwarts when he even had the spare time to wonder about such things in the worries of an oncoming war.Still, at the end of his third week, the question still remained. Why was Henry DeWitt placed in Gryffindor with his clever jokes, hard-working nature, care-taking attitude, and welcoming atmosphere that would be better suited for Hufflepuff?Or, 5 times MC Henry DeWitt shows the dysfunctional people of Hogwarts how to be taken care of, and the 1 time he really should've taken care of himself to avoid the same treatment.

summaries: “Stop, Tom. Stop doing this to me,” Percy whispers to him.There is a pause. “Percy, I’m not doing anything.”But Percy continues on, as if he hasn’t said anything at all. “Please Tom, I can’t do this to our Lord. Please…” his voice breaks, and something inside of Tom does as well. Tears slip down his face, and he furiously tries to scrape them away.“Please, Tom,” and now they are both weeping, staining the ground with more than just their communion. “All I’ve ever wanted…I just want to be good.”Tom laughs. It is a hollow, wretched thing. He thinks of anxiety-filled quiet, of a boy screaming, begging to be let out.“Me too, Percy. Me too.”***Or, everything Tom touches seems to hurt. summaries: They say every villain is the hero of their own story.Regulus Black believes this to be false. He is an anomaly to this rule, he is an outlier, because not only is he a villain to everyone around him, he’s also a villain to himself. When Regulus finds a bright, burning reminder of his past in his estranged brother, Sirius Black, he decides to chase this star from within the shadows. There's only one way to do this, however. He shamelessly uses his replacement, James Potter.But what starts as a means to an end, turns into an entanglement of romance between the most unlikely of matches; the boy who seeks refuge in shadow, and the boy who glitters in the sunlight. It's no surprise that Regulus can’t help but root himself further into tragedy, corroding everything his touch meets.Why?Because his life is a wasteland. And, That's just wasteland, baby.

summaries: In a grove that exists between somewhere and nowhere at all, Hermione has begun to find not only solace but friendships and family. As her relationship builds with Wilder, she begins to subconsciously recover who she once was while creating a new love story for who she has become. With a charmed list of Horcruxes in her possession and a flask containing a crucial memory of Millicent Carrow, Hermione discovers that there is much more to Lotus Grove and the wolves within, one in particular with an unbridled past. Her heart is woven between two princes born into darkness. One meant to wear the crown, and the other to lead the war. summaries: “Where in Umbridge’s speech did you get that from?” demanded Ron, his expression still slightly glazed over. “I just heard all the usual waffle about us being special and chosen.”Hermione sighed. “‘Let us preserve the divine culture of New Avalon’? ‘Progress for the sake of progress will make us lose sight of what separates us from Muggles’? Oh, and how could I forget ‘pruning what ought to be prohibited’? You’ve got to learn to cut the waffle open, Ron; how else are you going to know what to look for when making a judgement about someone?”“So you think Umbridge was sent here to, what, turn us into Hogwarts School of Etiquette and Hairbrushes?” demanded Ron.Hermione nodded gravely. “Yeah. That’s exactly what I think she wants to do.”Election Year has hit New Avalon, and everything is changing. This year, Lord Harry of the Honourable and Most Ancient House of Potter must navigate the chessboard of Pureblood society, whilst dealing with the appointment of a despotic High Inquisitor to Hogwarts, internal strife amongst previously-unshakeable friend groups, and his own confusing teenage feelings.

summaries: It’s weird how a 7 letter word holds so many secrets, regrets, betrayals, and love. It holds so much yet it seems insignificant with how it’s recklessly thrown around everyday. Hearts were broken because of it, ones with a shattered trust and an unfulfilled promise. There’s ones who went mad because of a mere word, spiraling in a pitiful frenzy just because someone broke or didn’t keep the promise. There are also ones, like I said, who take it to an extreme by playing with death just so their promise could never be broken. A promise of forever.And for James, it’s funny how the person who advocated so much about promises was the one who broke it first. OR: James and Regulus grew up in London being inseperable. But the secrets of non-platonic feelings and Harvard college applications led them to being separated by an ocean. And after 7 years of not seeing each other, they meet again. Hopefully the spark is still there.

What will Hermione do when she realizes that she has a soul bond with a dragon of all things?

summaries: James Potter, an arrogant, optimistic, ray of sunshine comes into contact with Regulus Black, a grumpy, sarcastic, moonbeam. Regulus also happens to be working as a government spy for the Order of the Phoenix, unfortunate enough for him, James is seeking out the order as he not only wishes to join and become an official member himself, but he also needs to locate his best friend: Remus Lupin.Remus was taken captive by death eaters, and James has his goals set on bringing him back home, but Regulus has other plans. After discovering that Albus Dumbledore has a plot to kill off Regulus as a 'sacrifice' he rebels against him.Against everything.Regulus is neither good nor bad anymore, he's a lone star. Regulus has decided to set on a quest in which he infiltrates the infamous gang ('the death eaters') base. To his annoyance, James Potter wishes to join him so he can retrieve his best friend, Sirius Black isn't going to let his baby brother go in there alone, and Marlene McKinnon is just there for laughs.Read on for a story of friendship, enemies, betrayal, love, and more.

summaries: Harry Potter lives in District 12 where every year per the Treaty of Treason, two tributes, male and female, are reaped to compete in the Hunger Games. His hate for the Capitol burns bright and armed with his contempt, obscure past, and charm, he enters the Games where only one of twenty-four tributes will leave a victor.Tom Riddle was born and raised in the Capitol under his father's influence. Training to become the Capitol's Defense Minister, he is given the task of mentoring District Twelve's two tributes.  “Well, what is your name, dear?” She asks uncomfortably with a slight laugh, green lipstick covering her patronizing smile.  Hadrian Evans is the name that’s on the tip of his tongue. That’s who he is here. But the Capitol will know.  He swipes his tongue at his bottom lip.  “Harry Potter.”

summaries: The documentary begins with an excerpt from the final show of the Mischief Tour, Sirius Black is singing 'Rebel Rebel', dancing and interacting with the audience and other members of the band. Another video begins, this time the band is gathered in a studio, Sirius, Peter and James playing cards while Lily and Remus play the same verse of “Sorry not Sorry” several times, trying to decide what would come after the repeated verse. Lily smiles at the camera and another video takes its place, this time a home recording of Sirius and Lily dancing to Ain't No Mountain High Enough, eventually Remus, James and Marlene join them. The video slowly disappears; Harry Potter, Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, smiling at the camera, appear in their place.  Harry Potter (host): This documentary is our attempt to transparently portray how the renowned rock band The Marauders rose to fame, as well as the reasons that led to their lasting hiatus three months after their unforgettable Heaven on Tour show on March 30, 2019.

summaries: O documentário é iniciado com um trecho do show final da Mischief Tour, Sirius Black está cantando ‘Rebel Rebel’, dançando e interagindo com a plateia e outros membros da banda. Outro vídeo começa, dessa vez a banda está reunida em um estúdio, Sirius, Peter e James jogando cartas enquanto Lily e Remus tocam diversas vezes o mesmo verso de “I wanna be yours”, tentando decidir o que viria depois do verso repetido. Lily sorri para a câmera e outro vídeo ocupa seu lugar, dessa vez uma gravação caseira de Sirius e Lily dançando ao som de Ain’t no Mountain High Enough, eventualmente Remus, James e Marlene se juntam a eles. O vídeo desaparece lentamente, Harry Potter, Hermione Granger e Rony Weasley, com semblantes contentes, aparecem em seu lugar, sentados em um sofá preto.  Harry Potter (apresentador): Este documentário é a nossa tentativa de retratar de forma transparente como a renomada banda de rock The Marauders foi alçada à fama, assim como os motivos que levaram ao seu duradouro hiato três meses depois do marcante show da Heaven on Tour do dia 30 de março de 2019.

summaries: This is a tale of five souls in desperate need of healing, one looking for redemption, another for approval, a third and a fourth for different kinds of freedom and the last to be normal again.Five Hogwarts students, by fate or sheer coincidence, will have their paths intertwined.Although the path each soul must traverse may be darker than most would dare to walk, each will find it rewarding in the end, even if more questions are raised than answered.A tale about healing, self-discovery, found family and loss. With a few cameos from heroes of past stories, our five heroes must navigate trying times facing radicals, old families, prejudice and their inner demons.Join our heroes in the 2023-2024 school year and tread this rather tortuous path of wrong promises, destruction of old beliefs and renewal of spirit.Warnings: English is my third language, so I apologise in advance for any oddities you may encounter; Updates will be weekly with a few extra updates should the time arise; Trigger warnings and tags will be given/updated as the story progresses.

summaries: Beware the darkness of dragons,Beware the stalker of dreams,Beware the talons of power and fire,Beware one who is not what she seems.- TUI T. SUTHERLANDOne does not choose to be born into Pureblood Society, they simply are. Edith was born into the Rowle name, but she was raised under Malfoy roof.The events that occurred at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry during the years 1991 to 1998 are well known to you. Names like Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, and Ron Weasely will live on forever in history as heroes. There are sides to this story, however, that were never heard. Stories like that of a young Slytherin witch, perfect in all the ways she was, and weak in all the ways she wasn't.It is time to start finding the heroes that fall through the cracks of history. After all, it is the smallest of dragons that are the quickest to strike.

summaries: To say Draco Malfoy spent time thinking about Harry Potter was probably an understatement at this point. His friends knew it, he knew it.Draco had hoped that joining Lockhart’s dueling club would appease his father, and impress Potter. It didn’t go exactly as planned on either front, but that was besides the point.Draco had learned a lot during that duel, that he was horribly under qualified to defend himself, and that Potter was made of fire. Since then, everything else in his life had been white noise, all he focused on was Harry. And the thing is, he noticed.He noticed the way he flinched when someone dropped a plate or set a serving spoon down too hard.He noticed that when the Weasel would wrap an arm around him and his entire body went rigid.

summaries: Once upon a time, a long time ago, well, about twenty years ago, Euphemia married her beast onfront of 6000 of their closest friends. Instead of a honeymoon, as a wedding present to their people, the couple united all of the kingdoms and got themselves elected as the King and Queen of The Kingdoms of Godrics Hollow.They rounded up all the villians and sidekicks, basically all the most interesting people, and threw them onto a small island called Azkaban with a magic barrier to keep them there.This, is my home. No magic. No WiFi. No. Way. Out.Well, that's what I thought. Prince James Potter, future King of the Kingdoms of Godrics Hollow, has a plan. A plan he's really passionate about. To bring the villian kids over to Godrics Hallow to attend Hogwarts and have a chance at being normal teenagers.He picks four kids to bring over. Pandora Lestrange, youngest child of the Queen of Hearts. Evan Rosier, son of Gaston. And the two sons of Maleficent, Sirius Black and his younger brother, Regulus.Regulus and Pandora also have a plan. To destroy Godrics Hollow and bring the villians back to power. Nothing can stop them.Except maybe the goofy Prince and his badass Princess.

summaries: “Everything will be different now.” She continues. “Starting today...more will be expected of you than ever before. And you can not fail me–fail your family. Do you understand?”“Yes, mother.” Because of course he does. Regulus understands what today means. He knows that he will never get a moment to be truly and completely alone again. That is why he had slipped away to the music room instead of attending breakfast. It was his last moment of peace. His goodbye to his old life in which he could enjoy his solitude. Because after today, all eyes would be on him and his family. After today, he would never be allowed to wander anywhere without supervision. Not even in his own home. Because today is the day he becomes a prince.~~~King Riddle has declared the Noble House of Black as his heirs to the Pureblood Throne among a viper pit of power hungry, envious nobles. Regulus and Sirius struggle to navigate life as royals where everyone they meet could want them dead, even those closest to them.

summaries: Pansy Parkinson has returned to England, against her better judgment. It's been six years since she left her family and best friend behind, during a period of her life she doesn't like to dwell on. At the encouragement of her best friend, Luna Lovegood, she decides to take a job at Hogwarts caring for some of the magical creatures that live there. Her return to England is anything but smooth, inciting flashy newspaper headlines, flareups of old wounds, and the ire of one Hogwarts Herbology professor. But Pansy refuses to let anyone control her life anymore, except for her.

summaries: Nagini never wanted a mate - she often discussed that with her master before. So why did he come home with a giant male snake and told her to bother her new companion instead of him? She would get the hatchlings together and maybe her master would let her eat the rat that deliciously smells like fear as a reward. Her master never liked him anyways.Or alternatively:- Nagini playing matchmaker- Harry is not having a good time- Voldemort didn't know that snakes could be gay but you learn something new every day

summaries: Regulus Black tinha quinze anos quando seu nome foi chamado pela primeira vez em uma colheita. Ele tem vinte e cinco anos quando isso acontece com ele novamente. Muita coisa mudou nesse tempo, e uma delas é que ele está pronto para fazer qualquer coisa que for preciso para chegar em casa. Nada nem ninguém irá detê-lo, nem mesmo James Potter.James Potter não tem planos de impedir Regulus Black de voltar para casa. Na verdade, seus planos giram em torno do oposto. Ele tem seus motivos, mas ele fez sua escolha de tirar Regulus da arena, nem que seja a última coisa que ele vai fazer.Sirius Black tinha dezesseis anos quando se ofereceu para pegar o lugar de seu irmão mais novo na arena. Aos vinte e seis anos, sem opção de fazer isso de novo, ele não tem escolha a não ser ser mentor de seu irmão e melhor amigo, sabendo que apenas um deles poderia voltar vivo.Dois nomes chamados, um mentor à beira de desmoronar e muito mais segredos e tristezas entre todos eles, mais do que eles sabem lidar. Nenhum deles está preparado para o que vem a seguir ou até onde irão para passar por isso.

summaries: He ducked, not fast enough, and the spikes caught on his clothes and yanked him off his Firebolt. He tumbled down the Horntail’s back, narrowly avoiding a frankly embarrassing fall to the death. The golden egg landed on the rocks below, bouncing off them and out of sight with a resounding clatter. Harry dove after it, desperate to reach it and be done with this entire debacle. Most of all, he wanted that dragon not to look at him like that anymore, lest he really threw up—or cried. —Harry finds a friend in unlikely places.

summaries: It was Halloween at the Malfoy Manor when he finally gave up the Potters’ location. Lucius was left in the Manor to guard Peter and he was meant to be watching him in case Peter made an attempt to tip off the Order but that wasn't really a concern, they didn't even take his wand from him. Peter hadn't made a single attempt to warn the Order in the year he'd been a death eater, why would that change now. He was even given free rein of the Manor, but he mostly stayed in the bathroom, retching into a toilet bowl. He was rinsing the vomit from his mouth at the bathroom sink, reminding himself over and over that James was an arrogant prick, Lily was a mudblood bitch and that Harry looked just like them, would grow up to be just like them, when he saw it. summaries: Grindelwald's war wages across Europe, The Second World War destroys the Muggle landscape. Harry Potter is introduced to the idea of Soul Displacement and Tom Riddle meets his equal. The Noble and Most Ancient House of Black stands upon the precipice of change, and must learn if they will survive the fall. She felt Tom Riddle’s magic rear its head, the burnt sugar and incense scent filling the space between them, filling her nostrils and swarming her head. She unfurled her own, watching his eyes narrow as she pushed his scent from her.“I am not a beast to be tamed and displayed.”  Riddle leaned further in his lips brushing her ear. Her knees were shaking, her back pin straight. She felt her face warm and her core pooled with warmth but her magic - her magic sharpened like a blade. She would remove a limb if he touched her, she just knew she could.  “And yet you seem to want to be tamed.”

summaries: In a world where the Dark Lord reigns supreme, the Battle of Hogwarts ended in despair, leaving Harry Potter's fate uncertain. Hermione, along with some of her steadfast friends including Ginny and Ron, clings to the hope that Harry might still be alive. As they embark on a quest to uncover the truth about his whereabouts, their mission takes a chilling turn. A mysterious serial killer, always concealed behind a white mask, emerges, leaving death in their wake, indiscriminately claiming lives from both sides of the war. Could there be a connection? In a race against time, Hermione and her friends must unravel the enigma behind the killer's mask, even as Hermione's heart may betray her along the way, all while striving to win the war that threatens to consume their world.

summaries: Electric-like jolts zapped down Albus' spine. Harry Potter... his father... on a chocolate frog card? He felt himself suck in the too-cool air through his lips, finding he'd altogether stopped breathing. His mind had already ached from doing cartwheels, riddling out the meaning behind what the trolly lady had said about The-Boy-Who-Lived.What does it say? Rose hastily jumped into the seat next to Will and peered down at the card. That's my uncle! Albus, it's definitely your dad.His feet took on the weight of molten Dwarf-lead, paralyzing him in time. W-what?Will read, The-boy-who-lived, only wizard known to survive the death curse, twice. Defeated the Dark Lord Voldemort during the Battle of Hogwarts. Successful Auror for the Ministry of Magic.  In which the children of the Golden Trio discover secrets beyond their parents' fame. Secrets that envelop them into conflict festering since the Dark Lord's death. As discontent brews between magical beings in Wizarding World, the next generation must decide who the right and wrong sort is for themselves.

summaries: “It is a truth, universally acknowledged, that a single wizard, in possession of good fortune, must be in want of a werewolf.”Muggleborn beauty Lily Evans’s prospects for a secure future seem set, when the handsome and agreeable James Potter moves into neighbouring Netherfield and appears immediately smitten. For her foster brother - the werewolf, Remus Lupin - however, things still seem bleak (though perhaps he has been listening too much to the prophecies of his sister, Sybil, of late). Things take a turn for the worse though, when the haughty Mr. Black seems determined to work against Lily’s interests, and worse again when their youngest sister Mary elopes with the devious Mr. Lockhart. With surprise proposals, chance meetings and broken hearts along the way, it will take Mr. Black putting away his pride and Remus casting aside his prejudices for everyone to get their happy ending.A Magical Regency AU Wolfstar and Jily retelling of Pride and Prejudice

summaries: Since he was very young, Peter Pettigrew has been plagued by visions of a terrible future that he would cause. Resigned to his fate, he tries to make the most of his school years.As time goes on though, he slowly begins to discover that maybe fate isn’t as set in stone as he thought.
